text: One of the best games I've gotten in a very long time. I absolutely love this game, and it's art. Everything included was really nice quality, game was easy to learn and fun to play. Best thing is that it can be played by yourself, which is great as I don't have friends. Games so rarely give you solo rules, and most that do are not good solo, but this one is. It's even better with friends if you have them. I've played this for hours and all the different rules from case to case really keep it fresh and entertaining. I recommend this very highly.

title: A really fun puzzle
text: Such a fun toy. I'll admit, I'm not smart enough for one that's three by three. This one was much higher quality than I expected, just as good as name brand. For the price, it just can't be beat. Would be a good gift as well.

title: A new favorite sand
text: An amazing new sand that I absolutely love. It's so very soft, and sticks to itself so well. That it never dries out is just great. The colors as well, are really nice and bright. I can't imagine anyone not loving this stuff, especially if they like other similar toys.

title: Fine boxes
text: They smell is quite bad, and even after many months, they still smell of very strong plastic. I wouldn't want my best cards in these. Quality is perfectly fine, they hold together well, and they hold cards well. But for the price, I can get better, so I don't personally see myself getting more. They are fine, not good or bad. If for some reason you find yourself needing a box that collapses, then this is that product.

title: Cool looking dice
text: Really good dice for any pirate or pirate character. They are balanced enough for regular play, but they are very slightly off balance because of the inclusions. Just not enough to really affect anything. Mine had no defects or bubbles.

title: Great fun
text: Every kid loves kinetic sand and mine were no different. They loved making things, smashing them and making new things. Mixing and mushing and shaping. Definitely worth getting for your kids. You'll want to make sure you keep it to a large container or a tarp though, as it is sand.

title: One of my favorite budget drones!
text: I've tested many drones and this is one of my favorite budget ones. It looks nice and is easy to fly. And at this price point, it's not a huge investment so if it does crash and burn, you won't be in tears because you broke a $1,000 one. It's a lot of fun to play with and easy for this old man to use even.

title: Great value
text: Great for giving as party favors or for giving to kids at Halloween time. Each bag is a good amount for a kid, but no where near as much as they show in the pics. Every kid I've met has loved kinetic sand, and a lot of adults too. For the price, it's a good buy.

title: A really great set
text:
Absolutely recommend these. With or without the pawns, it's a good deal either way. The artwork is nice on all of it, the quality was good as well. Nice thick paperboard for the pawns, and the cardstock on the deck was pretty sturdy. The packaging was much nicer than I expected, I have kept it for storage, where I normally just toss a box out to save on space.

This is very nice to have around for when the party randomly decides to go wildly off the rails, and I need something quick. Always good to have stuff like this waiting on the sidelines. But also good enough for being a part of the planned action.

title: Very fun
text: So great for Halloween or just being spooky at any time. They are really fun to play around with, and it so far always impresses. These are not custom fit, so the pinky was a bit big for me, and they really do work best when custom fit, and feel better too. But the custom fit ones takes months to get and cost hundreds. For the money you save, I absolutely recommend this.

title: HUGE set, great value!! Niece absolutely went crazy over this!
text: My niece is obsessed with this LOL stuff so I grabbed this one and helped her set it up. It has a TON of stuff in it and is a very large set! For the price, I'm actually very surprised with this one! Highly recommend it, this one is a lot of fun! Everything seems well enough made and I have zero complaints.

title: Cutest thing I've ever seen! Very well done.
text: This little cat is just the cutest!! Pictures don't do it justice, you absolutely need it! Well made and absolutely purrfect!

title: Lots of fun to assemble and very easy for those of us who are beginner level lego people
text: I can't do the more complex lego sets- don't have the patience for it at all. I set to doing this one and found it fun to do and it was oddly relaxing and satisfying for me, kind of like a puzzle. I really enjoyed it and will be getting more like this! The pieces all go together easily and look great, no complaints here!

title: Nice coin set!
text:
These all look great and are packaged very well! They're kind of jammed in the plastic slots but it keeps them from clanking around in shipping and getting scuffed up so it's worth the struggle to get them all out. It did take me a good minute to pop them all out too but they all look flawless so it's no big deal.

They all fit in the little leather pouch and are a lot of fun. I got these for a pirate display for Halloween and they look great with it! They're kinda pricey but all of these metal coins are. If you need bulk coins for a cheaper display, you can find plastic coins online cheap. But if you want some quality-looking coins, these metal ones are it!

title: Colors can't be unmixed
text: Was a fun looking kit, and for the first few minuets, it really was a lot of fun. But as you well know, sand doesn't unmix. You mix it once, and that's it, it's all one color. Making most of the tools pointless, as they are there to keep the colors separate so you can make a pattern. At that point, all you can do is cut the sand over and over again. Which, is a fun sensory activity, but it doesn't last long. Thankfully, the kids can just play with it like normal kinetic sand. I wouldn't bother with one use tools, just buy the kinetic sand on it's own and save yourself having to toss a bunch of plastic you just paid for into the trash. The sand itself is still good though.

title: Good sleeve pages
text: Lots of pages to hold a ton of cards. They have been good quality so far, and still look good after a lot of use. They aren't the highest quality, but they are a good price. They are still very clear, and do their job perfectly fine. If you want a lot of pages at a good price, then this is a good deal.

title: A pretty cool looking binder
text: This has been a really good case. Fits most cards very easily, and the zipper makes it so I never have to worry about them. It fits a ton of cards as well. It costs more than most of the other binders on Amazon, and I don't see anything about it that makes it better than the others though. The sleeves could be a little higher quality, I'm used to better brands, but they are still pretty good. You could also buy nicer sleeves, and put them in this binder, then get the best of both worlds.

title: A must get set of dice
text: Insanely high value for what you get. Heavy metal dice, with a cool and unique font. They are well balanced. Mine came without any defects. They include both a bag and case as well. I don't know how they do it, but I really have to recommend these.

title: Missing pieces
text:
When I first saw this, I really wanted both the fire and the ice dragon, and was sad when they stopped selling the fire dragon before I could get it. But after putting together the ice dragon, it had so many problems, I'm not really bothered by that anymore. It was missing a few important pieces, just that alone is awful, I really can't stand that, what are you supposed to do when you are missing pieces? But the pieces needed to be glued together. Now, I have a glue that melts and bonds plastic together and it worked perfectly, those bonds will never break. But you could never give that kind of glue to a kid.

If the company came back, without missing pieces and the pieces fit together right, I would LOVE to get any and all dragons they make, but as it is, I can't really recommend this to anyone. Unless you have high quality glue and are willing to buy extra parts, to have a huge display model you can't take apart and put away.

title: Great as always
text: I love mega brand figures so much, especially their Halo branded ones. They just can't be matched. These are no different, high quality, well painted figures. I can't imagine someone that loves Halo not loving these.

title: Very expensive
text: Great cars, the exact quality you would expect from hot wheels. Mine had no defects or issues with paint, and they are a quick way to get a full set of collectable cars. So great for kids or collectors. However, the price is way too high, in my opinion. Most of hot wheels collectible cars do cost more, but not this much.

title: Great sleeves
text: These are really great sleeves for board games. The feel is good, they have lasted a long time and are still going. I like the textured back, which many companies don't bother to do. They are very clear and a good thickness. None were damaged or missing. All in all, a great brand and I will certainly be buying from this company again.

title: One came broken, otherwise perfect
text: Very beautiful dice. They are classy and classic, the frost effect makes them look like they cost more than they did. One of my D20s was sadly cracked and chipped though. Very bummed about that. Thankfully they did have two in the set, but would have preferred it just not be broken. Everyone that's seen them has loved them, and they are light and well balanced.

title: Really cool looking
text: Really cool looking sandscape!! Arrived in good shape and looks amazing! Highly recommend.

title: Super cute nice looking plate set!
text: The printing on this is vivid and clear, not cheap looking at all! Medium sturdiness. Very adorable plates, highly recommend!

title: A bunch of clearanced garbage, the listing photos deceptive! (only half come in sleeves too)
text:
SO the photo shows a lot of stuff like The Walking Dead, Sin City, etc... You'll probably get none of that (I didn't) I did get 1 issue of The X Files, 1 issue Dr Who, and 1 issue of Dark Crystal. Other than that it's packed full of literally clearanced junk- they even have clearance stickers on them. Not worth the asking price in my opinion.

The one thing I give them is they are all in pretty flawless shape. Half of them came in protectors, the rest were put in a pile in the middle of the protected ones.

title: Best to get if you like not knowing what you'll get
text: The pieces are really fun to put together, and hold very well. Super easy to figure out on your own, but they do also come with instructions. There are a lot of good designs, but you can't know which ones you are getting. Would make a fun gift for someone if they like blind boxes. I got the rabbit. That's the problem with mystery boxes, you always get the one you want the least. Very few pieces, only three colors. The pieces all had streaks of other colors in them, especially the white. I expect they don't clean well enough between switching colors. A couple pieces were badly formed, they thankfully included enough extra pieces so I had just enough to finish my rabbit.

title: A cool set
text: Awesome set, love the Pokémon it comes with. Great quality on the pieces and nothing was missing. So much fun to put together and my kids love playing with it all the time. Mega did a good job.

title: Fun crayons for kids
text: Pretty great stuff. It was my first time working with gel crayons. They work a lot like a gel that you can turn into water color. They were fun to play around with. Love how many colors it has, and how the individual containers keep my fingers clean. The finished projects can smear easily is my only complaint. Not sure how to fix that...

title: Could have been better
text:
Could be great, if you have no cards and really love mystery boxes.

I got: 101 energies, one more than advertised, but eleven were so badly torn up, I had to toss them. 106 Pokémon and trainers in total. 72 commons, 29 uncommons and 5 rares.

I looked up all the cards I got, and there is 14 dollars of value in this 45 dollar box. Not a single good card, a hard no for me personally. Just buy boosters or get the cards you want as singles.

title: Why do they cost so much
text: Quality of the plastic and sculpts is great. Paint job is awful. All four of mine have messed up paint. Marvin's gun is bent into an L shape and is starting to break off. I won't be able to bend it back or it'll just fall off. I don't understand the quality when the price is so high. If these were cheap, I'd get it and be fine with it. But as is, I'd only recommend them to someone that is really into these characters. They do look good from a distance though, so I'll keep them around (After I touch up their paint jobs).

title: Great dice
text: Mine came with a couple missing sets. Of the sets I did get, they were all great. Beautiful colors, no defects. Easy to read and they were all balanced. It's nice to have so many colors to choose from. The price is pretty good and I loved the included bag. Would have been five stars if it came with all the sets it was supposed to.

title: Great dice
text: Large, heavy metal dice with great colors and a cool and unique design. They are well balanced, and mine came without any defects. They are great quality and I love them. You will want something to roll then on, as they are heavy enough to ding a tabletop.

title: Such cute stickers
text: These stickers were so cute. They were a hit with anyone that saw them. They stuck great, and have indeed been waterproof. Not sure if they will come off paper easily, but you can restick them if they are on a hard surface. With two hundred, you'll for sure find so many that you love and have plenty left over for sharing.

title: Amazing cards
text: These cards are great. The art is amazing and I love the theme. The quality of the cardstock is quite high as well. They have stood up very well to a lot of play, and still have a great feel to them. Overall, I'd easily recommend this to anyone looking for cards.

title: A must have for lovers of Zelda and Lego
text: As a Zelda fan, I really loved this set. The box it comes in is awesome looking, and I love the little block separator. The instructions were easy to understand and follow. I had no missing bricks, but the quality was definitely less than expected. I was able to get the model together, and it looks good and that's what matters. Love this set and I expect any Zelda fan would as well.

title: Great fun
text: Great fun to put these together. I like that there were three and that they kind of go together. The instructions were easy enough to understand. The dragon having giraffe patterns was odd, but I didn't mind, as I painted it my own colors. The wood was good quality and everything is holding together well. Best part is, now that they are done I can use them as cool displays. They were quite a bit larger than I expected as well. For the price, these were great.

title: A fun project
text: An awesome set, to both build and display. Putting it together was fairly easy, and the parts were all well made. The instructions were good, and I had no missing or broken parts. I had so much fun building this set. Being able to display it after is an added bonus. It'll look even better after I put some wood stain on it, but even as is, people love to play with it whenever they see it.

title: Stores everything I need for a game
text: A great storage solution if you have too many dice like I do. I not only love having the case to store and carry my dice, but having the built in dice tray is a necessity now that I have some metal dice sets. Those would damage a table right away without something like this to roll them in. I do wish the top would come off or lay flatter though, but that's my only complaint. The dragon design and the zipper pulls really draw attention, people love this case. The whole thing is just really well made for the money.

title: A cool decoration
text: Lots of gem samples. It would indeed be hard to find this many different samples all in one set. I do like how they are set up and it makes a great background decoration. I wouldn't call this educational though, it comes with no information whatsoever. It would make a good gift for anyone new to collecting. The stones I got were all without flaws, which was a nice surprise, for the price I expected worse quality.

title: Best quality cards and art
text: Spectacular cards, both in quality and artwork. Some of the best cardstock you can get, so this will last forever if you take care of them. They feel great when shuffling, dealing and just holding them. The artwork is what really catches you though, it is a step or two higher than you would expect on cards. Love the theme and style. The bonus map card was a fun surprise. Can easily recommend these.

title: Best looking game I own
text:
Such a beautiful game, I love all the art. I never played this as a kid, but it was pretty easy to pick up and start playing. The pieces are all super high quality, and the stickers are really cool. The box is gorgeous (Inside and out.) and easily stores all the pieces even after you punch them off the card they come on. The finish on the tiles really pushes them over the top in attention to detail, and just making everything look very deluxe.

And of course, the most important thing; the game is super fun. Absolutely recommend this!

title: They died right after I added the food
text:
I have raised sea monkeys off and on since I was a child. I was a huge fan of them as a child and had almost all the memorabilia/sets. I was a member of any sea monkey forum and was always checking out the official and unofficial sea monkey pages. I can keep a tank of sea monkeys alive for years with ease.

That being said, all mine died. I followed the directions to a tee, and nothing in them was really wrong. But when I added the food, they all died. I can't figure out why, but it had to be the food. I added in the right amount. Maybe just over population? I had to have had about three hundred babies. But whatever the case, it's one star because there is absolutely something wrong with this set.

The tank is nice, and I liked the sticker that goes on the bottom, it would have helped to cover up the muck that would have built up over time if the brine shrimp had lived. I would have liked more color options. The instructions were quite good. Not including everything dying, the set would have got four or five stars. It was a cool set.

title: Could have been better, but it's not bad
text:
OK Just to start, that box is awful. It takes up SO much space! When you put the cards in it, it has so much empty space, that makes it take up room on my shelves, but then when you open it, it just has flaps that fall down everywhere for no reason, taking up a huge chunk of the table.

It's not 150 different cards, there are repeats of common items, which makes sense. The art is nice, but not great. Font is a little small. And lastly, they are just regular D and D items, nothing special, just items from the basic book. Not really complaints, more just pointing things out.

I would have said these were ok, but the official brand has a set here on Amazon that has way more cards, for way less money and they have much better art and better cardstock. So it's just a worse value.

title: A good family game
text: Love all the potato humor. It's helps spice up the game a bit. It's very simple, I have friends that don't like the really complex games and only want to go a step above go fish, this is a game for them. It's super easy to learn. My friends have so far all enjoyed the game, and that it is over in a fairly short amount of time. I love the metal tin and theming.

title: A good set of dice
text:
Good dice, that look great and roll well. Nice and heavy as well. They are very dark, so they can be hard to read. The design is cool as well, and I like how many color options they give. Really awesome looking tin included as well.

My first set came and the dice had dented the included tin so bad it wasn't usable, and the D8 had broken. Amazon sent a replacement and the tin was again very badly dented by the dice, but it was usable, and no broken dice.

title: Could have been epic
text:
Worst quality dice I have ever received. The D6 had metal flashing all over it that was as sharp as a razor. I had a metal file I could take it off with, but where I took the metal flashing off, it no longer has the bright finish, as you would expect. The top of the D6 also sticks out just a tiny bit, probably where the flashing came from, but it's not a perfect cube.

Half the dice have faces that have so little enamel, that there are bald spots all over. A couple other faces have too much. And many dice have spots of enamel in places that are supposed to have just plain metal. Very messy, sloppy and ugly dice.

Still gave it two stars, because they all roll very well, and weigh a good amount. Like, they function fine, they're just ugly. The tin case they come with is very cool as well, though badly dented by the dice.

title: A huge hit
text: Such a fun and pretty castle. This was fun to put together, the instructions were good. The pieces all fit very nicely, and none were missing. A great generic castle that would go with just about any other princesses. This set has gotten so much use, it was worth every last penny.

title: Amazing useable prop
text: It's a really cool prop! That was honestly my biggest reason for getting it, and I don't regret it. So, it looks cool, but it is also functional. Having my spells all in one place is handy. The cards it comes with are really nice, thick card stock. I got plenty to spare, so can write down spells for many characters and just use the same book for all of them. Would love to see this in more colors. Black especially, but a Cthulhu green would be cool as well.

title: Everyone loves it
text: An absolutely magical looking book nook! This on it's own is so wonderful to look at, but up on the shelf surrounded by books, it just absolutely belongs there. I highly recommend getting one of these for yourself, or as a gift to a friend. It was easy to do, just pull the parts out and glue them together as instructed really.

title: Good to have
text: Nice looking box, to both store and carry my dice for my table top game. The lid being able to double as a rolling tray saves space and is great for me, as I have been getting metal dice as of late, and they would ruin the table for sure if I didn't have this. The magnets could be better, but hold well enough unless I'm being unnecessarily rough with it. The design is pretty cool as well.

title: Best mats!
text: Absolutely love this company. I have several mats from them and always come back for more. Their quality is ten out of ten, from the material to the printing. All the designs have been stunning and this one is no different. I will always very highly recommend this companies mats to anyone.

title: Great price for metal dice
text: A really great price for metal dice. They look good, but the design is generic enough you could use it with virtually any character you could think of. They are decently heavy, but not as much as the more ornate metal dice. They roll well and come with a little bag to keep them in. All in all, a good set to start out with.

title: Great design for table top games
text: The dice are nice and heavy, with a well balanced roll. The design is cool, but generic enough to go with virtually any character. No defects found and they came in a nice tin to keep them in when not in use.

title: So cute!
text: Super cute and soft kitty cat plushies! I really love these and the quality of them is really high. I would have liked them to have a little more stuffing, but they still have plenty enough. If you love cats, then these are for you.

title: Worst crystals I've ever seen
text: One of the very worst products I've ever got. It was very expensive, and all I got were the smallest, junkiest stones I've ever seen. They were cracked, dirty and some were regular rock with a sliver of crystal. Some of the stones had slipped into the compartments of other stones. The desert rose was smashed to nothingness.  I wouldn't have paid more than a couple dollars for this.

title: Sturdy dice box with tray
text: Beautiful tray that holds so many sets of die. I love having the felt on one side as well, I have been getting a lot of metal dice lately and they'd tear up a table if I didn't use the included dice tray on this. The engraving on top is the best part though, everyone loves it. The wood is pretty sturdy and the magnets hold quite well.

title: Clear and high quality
text: Really great quality on these penny sleeves. One of the very best I've ever got, and the price is great as well. I'm very happy to have found these. I can't imagine using anyone else next time I should need penny sleeves. However, with a full one thousand sleeves, that's going to be a long time. I very highly recommend these.

title: Beautiful dice
text: Beautiful, stain glass like dice. They really were more stunning than I expected they would be when I got them. They are heavy, and well balanced. I'd love to get another set in a different color, they are that nice. Only complaint is the glitter rarely got outside where it was supposed to be. But that's a very small complaint.

title: Ultimately useless
text:
This is in theory an awesome device. It has nearly all of the old game boy color games I had as a child, but their batteries no longer work. Only problem is, the buttons aren't mapped properly, and no GB game can use the select button. It physically works, just nothing is mapped to it. Every game I want to play needs the select button to play, so they can't be played. That makes it useless at the end of the day.

Very sad to have been so close. The aspect ratio is also WAY off on game boy games. As for the other games, they stuttered a lot and were very hard to play because of that. Screen is great, battery wasn't, but I played it plugged in anyway. I contacted the seller and they were quick to respond, but said the buttons could not be remapped. Bad programming has made something that would have otherwise been a ten out of five stars for me, only one.

title: Cute Halloween bears
text: Very cute bears and Halloween themed, which I love so much. First bears I got had parts sewn on backwards, but these bears came in perfectly fine. They are very small. They are also very soft and cute and they stay in a sitting position well.

title: A beautiful clock
text: Very easy and fun to put together. It looks stunning, and wood stain just makes it even better! No missing parts but I will strongly recommend making sure you have sand paper. Some of the pieces needed to be lightly sanded to fit together better. It comes in a beautiful wooden box as well that looks like a book. I use it as a stand and they look quite good together.

title: Great ice castle set
text: A great ice princess castle set. Lots of pieces for the price, and they were all good quality too. Everything went together well, and nothing was missing. It was really easy putting it together by just following the instructions. This was a very well received gift.

title: A lovely puzzle
text: Great puzzle. Had so much fun with it. The slow gradation of the blue makes it really easy to put together, for a 1,000 piece puzzle. The shape of the pieces could have been a little more varied though, that would have helped a bit. The pieces were a nice snug fit though, and I like when the pieces go together nicely.

title: Striking color combo
text: Great dice for the price. Heavy, metal with a contrasting enamel; the red and black is bold and you can easily see the numbers. They roll well and had no flaws in my set.

title: Great dice
text: Amazing looking dice. Very unique and really fun to play with. You'll definitely not want to roll these on a nice table though. They are well balanced, hefty and have a good overall feel to them. They aren't the best for seeing what you rolled if you play in a poorly lit area though. Very happy to add these to my collection.

title: Shiny and unique
text: Love the metallic look. Most balloons are very basic and look all the more so next to these. They have been a very fun and bright pop of color to my assortment. They aren't the highest quality I have used, but are pretty good and worth it for the unique end result.

title: Good metal dice
text: Good metal dice. They are well balanced, heavy and sound great being rolled. Fairly easy to read the numbers, but the numbers are the same color as the rest of the die, so not for those that game in near dark. This design is new for me and I'm quite happy to add it to my collection. Oh, and it came with a metal tin to store them in, which was nice.

title: Fun dice
text: Nice, shiny dice, with a cool gimmick. Or maybe a warm gimmick. lol The numbers are bright and easy to read and the dice are all well balanced metal. They change colors in your hand, you just have to give the metal a bit to warm up. But if you are like me and always fiddling with your dice, they'll be changing colors plenty.

title: Decent black balloons
text: Love having black balloons. Usually, most packs only have bright colors, and black is almost impossible to find. They could have been slightly better in quality, but for what they cost, I got a good deal. Will get more when I run out.

title: Magical dice
text: Stunning dice! The most magical looking I own, and I own a lot. I absolutely love these. The quality was really good on the paint and they are well balanced. Smooth and sharp with a nice unique font. Great for my sorcerer, but would do just as well for so many classes. A big recommend from me.

title: This review is for a set that is sadly no longer available
text: Such a beautiful sharp edge dice set in a color combo (Galaxy Orange Blue) that I've never seen before. I really wanted them but hesitated because of the crazy high price tag. I did end up getting them, and have found them to be really good quality. They are indeed sharp edged, without any flaws in the resin. They are well balanced and the colors are nice. The paint job in the numbers could have been better for the price. Overall, they are good quality dice, so I'll rate them highly, but I personally don't see the point in paying many times the price for dice that are slightly sharper edged. It doesn't take anything extra to make them like that, so I'll stick to reasonably priced dice 'til the trend dies down.

title: Love the animals
text: Lego animals are very hard to find, and this has many that look just like them. As well as a bunch of pieces to make a thick jungle scene. No instructions, but you just stick plants where you think they would look nice, easiest set to build really. Would have liked them to include the bricks to fill in the gap in the cow though. But that's a tiny complaint.

title: Love the animals
text: Lego animals are very hard to find, and this has many that look just like them. As well as a bunch of pieces to make a thick jungle scene. No instructions, but you just stick plants where you think they would look nice, easiest set to build really. Even comes with a mini fig, which is not common for these kinds of sets.

title: A great Snoopy plush
text: I was amazed at how good this item was when I got it. Lots of plush animals I get from China have come with very large holes, and it's rare to get them in good quality. This was very good quality, no holes, good fur, looks like Snoopy and was not underfilled. That alone made it a good buy, but the price makes it even better. I highly recommend this plush.

title: Fun colors
text: I like that this set came with a couple very unique color combos I haven't ever seen before. Like that they come with bags as well. These are a good deal, for your typical acrylic dice. They are well balanced, and mine came without flaws.

title: Fun tarot cards
text: Really pretty cards, I love holo and tarot, so this was a great set for me to grab. They are easy to see, shine very well, shuffle well and the card stock is decent. However, I find it very odd they chose to take up so much space writing the names down twice. That could certainly have been planned better.

title: Good detail
text: Beautiful dice, very fitting for several classes and campaigns I can think of. They are light, well balanced and quality. Great for the dice hoard.

title: Fun for adults
text: This thing looks cool, and is cool. That's reason enough to get it. Keep in mind, finding wicks and gunpowder is very hard nowadays. It is unfortunately very weak; but still should only be used by adults.

title: Yes you NEED this! It grows on you quick!
text:
We saw the banana man and laughed for a second but the more I thought about it, the more I needed one! We got him and he's been a big hit at my house, we can't imagine life without this hilarious little guy!! If you have a sense of humor and think something goofy like this is funny, definitely get it.

Quality wise he's great! No stitches out of place and all of his seams are closed up. He poses very easily into whatever pose you want. Tons of fun!

title: Awesome design
text:
So the set is super cool and cute, which of course meant I had to have it. The amount of money for how many pieces you get is ok, not good or bad. When I got the set, I found it doesn't have any instructions though, just a QR code, which I can't use. The pieces themselves are good quality, and none were missing.

While looking to see if the instructions could be found online, I found that this design is from a Lego artist, the set is called 'Godzilla Brickheadz' by 'Brickdroid'. You can search that and find the instructions btw if you need them. I like that all the pieces are included, as from Brickdroid, it's only instructions and you have to get the pieces yourself. But they need to credit him. You don't steal from an artist, period.

title: Speedy RC
text: So much bang for your buck on this one. It is really fast, brakes work great, the battery lasts a good amount of time for its size, was sturdy and it comes with lights. Most kits you have to get the lights separate and install them yourself. The controller is among the best I own, I really love having all the extra control.

title: A great set
text: Great dice and a lot of them. Very easy to read and the were well balanced. I love the range of colors, you'll have something for just about anything. The font is a new one for me and I quite liked it. Plus the included bag was nice as well.

title: LOVE this! I'm an 80s/90s kid so this brings back memories!!
text: I had so many of these as a kid and this one works just like the old ones did! It writes well and each color works as it should when you select it. Definitely a great product!!

title: Great set for kids
text: Incredible deal. The large dino by itself would be a great deal, but add in that you can also make lots of little things from the same pieces and that just makes it even better. The dino almost has a transformers vibe to it as well. It looks cool, has lots of pieces and all the pieces fit together well. Overall, a great set.

title: Best putty ever
text: This is hands down, the best putty ever. Not just because I love unicorns either, though that helps. Beautiful in light and so cool in the dark. It's got a great feel and you get a good amount as well.

title: Great slimes for the kids
text: It came out so soft and fluffy. We really enjoyed this slime and can easily recommend it.

title: Could be more careful with the paint
text: Very pretty dice, that are certainly very showy and impressive. Mine were nicely balanced, and even though they are metal, are quite light. The gold paint on my numbers was put on a little too hastily, and it is also all around the numbers on several faces, and it's like that on most of the dice. For such a very high price tag, I would expect better.

title: Huge die
text: A fun die to play with. Pretty convenient as well. The quality is quite good, no flaws in the resin or paint. This is a hand full  of a die, and I wholly recommend getting one, if not for your dice hoard, then just because it's fun to roll around a table.

title: Could have been better
text: Love the black sand, it's really hard to find in that color. However, each of the crates is only half full and nowhere near as big as the pictures led me to think, so we didn't get near what we were expecting. Such a small amount of sand, though, the dino figs were cool, but they are not worth what you pay for. The crates don't hold the sand, as they aren't tight fitting, and it just comes out from all the cracks.

title: Fun to play with when idle
text: Pretty fun desk toy. Looks great, and lasts a good while. One color does run out before the other though, but not a big thing. I remember these from when I was a kid, and I'm glad to see them coming back.

title: Cool looking dice
text: Amazing skull and bones design. I have no other dice that look like this and haven't seen any others on here. The quality was great, not a single complaint there. A cool black, but not so dark it obscures the details. They are heavy, and well balanced. With a unique font even, these are very fitting for a pirate themed character.

title: Awesome dice
text: Such awesome looking dice! I love the color scheme, but they are also well balanced, which is really a necessity. Plus so many, you'll never need more. Great to use as tokens for Magic the Gathering.

title: Great value
text: So many beads for so little money. All the beads were great quality as well. They were used mostly for craft purposes, but also work great as sensory toys, as ammo and more.

title: Wonderful
text: Such a lovely item for my desk. Though I could also see it being used as home décor or even a toy for an older, responsible child. The sand falling can last all day, and watching the patterns slowly emerge and change can really fascinate. I absolutely recommend getting one for yourself or a gift. It was well packaged with enough foam to make sure it came in one piece.

title: Mesmerizing
text: Such a lovely item for my desk. Though I could also see it being used as home décor or even a toy for an older, responsible child. The sand falling can last all day, and watching the patterns slowly emerge and change can really fascinate. I absolutely recommend getting one for yourself or a gift. It was well packaged with enough foam to make sure it came in one piece.

title: Great dice
text: So many beautiful colors and designs, this brand will likely have something to fit what you want. They are heavy, and roll evenly. None of mine have ever had any defects and they come with a little velvety bag to keep them in.

title: Great dice at a good price
text: So many beautiful colors and designs, this brand will likely have something to fit what you want. They are heavy, and roll evenly. None of mine have ever had any defects and they come with a little velvety bag to keep them in.

title: Too much fun
text: A huge amount of sand at an ok price. I like that it has little containers to keep the sand stored, and it's got two of each color to make sharing easy. This is always a hit and keeps kids occupied for hours.

title: Good fun
text: These were good fun and can keep the kids busy for a long while. Only limit is your imagination, so long as you have enough pieces in the colors you need. You can make just about anything. But not anything from the included guide book, as I didn't have enough pieces of the needed colors for that. Speaking of colors, they were not even in number, had too many pink and light pink, and not enough of others.

title: Very cool looking, but too small
text:
As far as looks go, this tray is awesome, a five out of five for sure. Sadly, that's about all it has going for it. It is very small, only four inches across is not enough for a die to roll. Also small are it's dice holders, they will not fit most of my dice, only the small plastic ones. Speaking of small plastic dice, that's all you'll want to use on this, as anything with sharp corners or made of metal is going to leave big dents in the wood.

The first one I got was broken, it seems the places it goes together are very tight, and a plastic layer couldn't take it and broke. They however did send a replacement, which was nice of them.

title: A great gift
text: Such an adorable plush, and the very softest as well. Great quality sewing and design. It was loved so much by the one getting it, it's absolutely worth buying one. I love GUND so much, and this plush lived up to the hype they have.

title: So much sand
text: I like the fold up case, it's a nice thick plastic that gives you a place to store all your sand accessories like the rake and molds, but also the sand itself. It also gives lots of space to play where you don't have to worry about mess. Ten pounds of sand is a lot and it's going to last just about forever, so the cost is absolutely worth it IMO. The included molds also fit the castle theme and are pretty sturdy. All in all, a good product.

title: Awesome dice
text: Very heavy and well balanced dice. They look cool and go great with a lot of different kinds of characters you could play as. Even after much play, the paint has stayed on, but I do take good care of my dice. These are good quality dice, and I recommend getting a set.

title: Must have
text: This thing is so super cool. I love it it so much. Great battery life, the 'smoke' is pretty lifelike as well, and I've never had anything that could do that. The recoil when shooting the BBs is also realistic looking. Love that it includes an extra set of treads to change to depending on where you are using it. Best RC I own by far and I recommend this thing to just about anyone.

title: Cool dice
text: Pretty cool looking dice, and very heavy. They roll well and are a good enough quality, I don't worry about their finish or the enamel coming off. These are great dice, and I love them, but the price is almost double what other dice of the exact same quality here on Amazon tend to cost.

title: Gorgeous dice
text: I absolutely love this brand so much. Everything they have put out has been the highest quality and these dice are no different. Very heavy, evenly weighted and the numbers are easy to read, as well as being a unique font, unlike all the other dice. The included bag is nice quality as well, and also the tin box they come in.

title: Such a great value
text: So many dice for so little money. Yet they are great colors, that are painted well, and roll great. They even glow in the dark, which is so cool! I really love all the dice I have from this company, and these aren't the first or last I've gotten from them. Highly recommend.

title: Great value
text: Awesome builds. Both fun to put together and play with. They also look great on display. The instructions were easy, and no missing pieces, with everything fitting together well. Overall, a great set. I really loved it.

title: Cute fluffy bear!
text: He arrives kind of mushed so you need to pull him out and shake him a bit to fluff his fur up but other than that he looks great! Typical Gund quality here, he looks just like the picture! He's not over or under stuffed, I'd say just the right amount of stuffing. I don't see a single stitch out of place or a single flaw on him- he's perfect!!

title: Color shifting show stoppers
text: Beautiful dice, blue/purple and silver is such a great combination. I love how they change colors depending on their angle. Easy to read and they roll well. Bag was basic, but soft, and holds the dice well. I highly recommend these metal dice

title: Great value
text: Considering how much it is to get coins, and a bag, this bundle really saves money. But what I love most about it is how cool it all looks! Beautiful, shiny, heavy, gold coins, with cool images. The bag is well made, and the coins fit nicely. I would love to have more.

title: Cool looking tarot
text: Coolest looking tarot cards I own. I love the rainbow foil effect so much, I could stare at these all day and not get bored. The cardboard the cards are made of is not the best though, and I doubt that they would stand up well to years of shuffling. However, shuffling would scratch up the foil and I knew that getting them, so wasn't really planning to use them that way. I 100% recommend getting these for decoration, as for shuffling, I'd be gentle with them if you used them for readings.

title: Great fun
text: This is an incredibly fun game to play at parties. The quality of everything is high and if you are a fan of odd one out, then you really have to get this. So highly recommend. Only one issue with it is that you have to have at least three players at minimum. That does mean it doesn't get used as often as I would like. Would like to have seen a set of modified rules for one or two players.

title: Cool designs
text: Fun to put together and they each look good. I haven't been able to paint them yet, but even as is, they look good and I like that they all match in style. There were no missing pieces and the wood was good quality.

title: A cool looking gimick
text: Looks cool, and feels cool as well. The design of the character is loved by my kid, but they have found that the figure doesn't really hold much of a pose. I can't get it to do much of a pose either, even when I pump it as much as I can, it holds a little, but not much.  But my kid doesn't care, they just wanted a squishy space shark and that's what this is, so it's not really an issue.

title: Awesome little house
text: Great looking block set. I love the movie this came from, but even if you don't know it, I could still see this as a pretty cool set. The pieces held together well, and the clear pieces at the bottom are a cool addition. The roof however, took a long time to get together and keep together, as the angled pieces had to be pushed on when putting the other side up, and they'd constantly break off the other side. The instructions were great. I got my set right before they started adding the bird and dog, so I sadly didn't get those.

title: A good dice tower
text: Good quality wood and well made dice tower. Looks pretty decent, rolls well and I love that it can also store my dice. Works with any standard size dice.

title: Fun but way overpriced and doesn't always work as it should
text:
This price point is insane for a few pieces of plastic, it's highway robbery really. Aside from the price though it is fun to play with but the track doesn't always work as it should, you really have to launch the cars to get them to go thru the loop and even then many hot wheels cars won't work on this.

Overall it's a neat track, I just think Hot Wheels has gone overboard with their pricing for some thin plastic is all.

title: A good upgrade
text: If you have the base game, then this is a good upgrade to grab. Like most board games, it'll eventually get stale, but by adding in these new cards and mechanics, you can keep that board game going for much longer. It's been a year and this has kept the game fresh and fun.

title: Fun to put together
text: This kit was pretty fun to put together, it took a decent amount of time and all pieces came out without breaking, which is always a plus. However, there were some parts that were too fiddly and required too much messing with to get the finished product to work perfectly, and that really did take some of the fun out of it.

title: The regular size is the only real usable one here for me personally.
text:
SO the large one is so large it doesn't really work right. It MIGHT be good for going down stairs though (don't have any to test) But the small ones so small it doesn't work really. The mid size one of course is just right and gives you the traditional slinky action.

One gripe is they have some weird ends on these that look kinda cheap. I don't remember seeing these growing up, maybe it's a new safety thing or a cheaper end but the ends of them look tacky.

Overall it's a cute set and it's not a terrible price so you may as well get it and give it a try if you have a want for multiple sized slinkies. Personally- I'll just stick with the traditional mid sized one that comes in this kit. (the regular size)

title: Easy to put together, lots of fun!
text:
This was easy to put together and folds up nicely for storage in my garage. Definitely NOT made for storing outdoors at all but you could pull it outdoors on a non rainy day. The score sensors work great. The whole thing is a little bit wobbly of course due to the design, the whole middle part is fabric so it's going to have a little wobble to it of course. It doesn't make it unusable though and isn't the end of the world.

Honestly the only complaint I have is I feel like this is a bit pricey and you're paying for a brand name. This should be more like $150 in my opinion but if you're fine with the price point then this is pretty nice and you'll like it. It's big enough for adults to enjoy too. Great for garage arcades when your space is limited!

title: Awesome race car!
text: This thing looks really cool! Drives well and is a ton of fun for even adults to play with! Seems to be pretty good quality.

title: Works. Cheaply made but works with WET packable snow.
text: This is cheaply made for sure but the price isn't a lot either. It DOES work if you use it with the more wet packable snow. If you make a snowball and it won't stay together, that's not the right snow to use in a mold- it won't work. But if you make a snowball and it packs well then you're in business and you'll be able to make lots of little penguins! This was a lot of fun to use and I covered the edge of my lawn in little penguins!

title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these!
text: Initially, I felt they were pricey but these are full-sized dolls so when you divide the price by four, they're really not that bad. Quality is fantastic and they put pretty good detail into these! I saw some negative reviews on them so I was on the fence about ordering them but I can tell you if you love Disney villains- you'll LOVE these! A must-have for any collector! I'm absolutely glad I took the leap and ordered these!

title: LOVE this set!!!
text: Absolutely love everything about this set! Was a blast to put together and even more fun to play with! I'm a giant little kid when it comes to Lego and this set is just too much fun! I love the spider things in it, the giant Lion guardian- just everything in the set is amazing! They went into great detail putting this one together and making it as cool as possible. Definitely one of my favorite sets in the Monkie Kid line!

title: Fun little set
text:
This one's not my favorite of the Monkie Kid series- there are a lot of other sets that are far cooler. But if you're like me and like to have a complete set- I'd say get it still. It's still fun to assemble and play with and I can't imagine displaying a set without the whole set!

Typical Lego brand quality- great attention to detail!

title: Creepy cool spider! LOVE this!
text: Love this creepy spider set, it was a blast to build and I'm having a lot of fun playing with it! Great quality set, great details, not a complaint with this one at all!

title: Amazing quality as usual with Lego, love this set!
text:
Lego did some great designing on this set, it's truly amazing! It was a blast to assemble and even for this adult- it's a blast to play with! I keep it on display in my glass case now so I can open it up and play with it anytime I want and I enjoy seeing it when I'm not playing with it too. You won't get this quality from any of the competitor's brand building blocks that's for sure!

Love all the little details on this and this made me more excited than it should have to assemble! Definitely get it!

title: Beautiful set! Pricey but beautiful- love this!
text: We got several sets from this series and they've all been fantastic! This one I think is my favorite in the set- I really enjoyed the detail on this one. The waterfall and all of the scenery are really beautiful! Great Lego quality set as always. Of course, we know Lego isn't cheap but they priced this one higher obviously because it's also branded with the Monkie Kid. But if you're willing to pay the price, the sets definitely going to be worth it! You can't get this quality from any other brand building blocks.

title: Really cool Lego set!
text:
Got this for my autistic friend and he absolutely loved it!! He was able to build it easily and has had a lot of fun playing with it! It has many pieces so it kept him busy for hours!

It's a boat thing and then it opens and turns into something else. It's really neat and has a lot of detail!

My only complaint is that they jump up the prices in sets like this because they're branded. Other than that, this sets perfect!

title: Amazing quality- really fun set!
text: This monkey kid set was a lot of fun to put together and it's typical Lego quality- very well made! My only small problem with this is the cost- these monkey kid sets are expensive! Cost aside though it's fun to assemble and play with. We now have it in a display case along with the other monkey kid sets and it looks great! Definitely recommend.

title: Cool little set
text: Great set to get for fans of the frozen movies. Best part is all the little sets having two ways they can be made. This will definitely keep a kid entertained for a long time. For the price, this is a good set. No missing pieces and all the pieces went together well. Instructions were good.

title: Good set, instructions and price could be better
text: All the pieces were accounted for and went together well. If you follow the directions closely, then you'll be able to put this together, but it is indeed an odd way to make instructions. They jump around a lot. I don't believe I've ever seen another company do it that way before. I really did like this set and I recommend it, but not as much as I would if the price were better.

title: A fun set
text: This brick set was pretty good overall. The instructions were very easy to follow. The figures are a little simple, and the starfish in mine was smashed and broken. But the set as a whole made up for that, as I really like how it's also a pen holder, photo frame and has a little drawer. I didn't even know that at first, but now it can go on my child's desk and be a fun toy/ useful supply.

title: Great dice
text: No defects at all, and they roll great. Best thing is the looks though. Beautiful enough to stand out on the table from all the ordinary dice. Very heavy and metal, so a box may be best to roll them on, so you don't dent up your table. Highly recommended.

title: Great for a new table to have
text: Shockingly heavy, very sturdy and they look great. The image is clear without any pixilation, and the surface wipes up perfectly. I love how varied the images are, they really encompass 99% of what new player campaigns revolve around. These are going to get a lot of use for many years to come.

title: Useful dice
text: Great to have for fun and just making quick stories to play through later. Very useful to have for making things up on the fly because your party has already beaten everything faster than you expected. Your only limit is your own imagination. But speaking of imagination, if you're good on that front, you wouldn't really need these would you?

title: Very cool dice
text: Super great quality dice. Also, super cool looking. Love metal hollow dice and dragons and this has both of those things. They roll well, are well balanced and have been played with a ton and are still in the same shape as when I got them.

title: Very stiff bag
text: Quality of the bag is great. For that alone I'd rate it highly. However, the bag looks so derpy when you use it. I just can't get over it. One of my bags eyes is just slightly off from the other one, which doesn't make the derpy look any better... But, it holds dice well, and that's what it's for. If you like the look of it, then I'd say get it.

title: A good Halloween activity
text: A good Halloween activity for very young children. There really isn't any room for much creativity with these, but you can't really mess them up, so I'd get blank sheets for older kids and give these to the youngest. Having them be two sided is a genius idea that doubles the time you can keep kids occupied. They are such cool and fun designs, that they would even make for great decorations after the children are done with them.

title: Beautiful
text: A very beautiful puzzle. The wood was great quality, and the little animals in the puzzle were a cool addition. I liked how long it took to put together, however, I don't like how it goes together. Many of the pieces don't grab onto other pieces, they are just two flat sides pressed up against each other. so ever bump and nudge causes you to have to go back and put everything in place again.

title: Fun, cool game
text: Loved this game just from laying my eyes on it. The art style was a big part of my grabbing this, but the gameplay itself is really great and matches or even exceeds expectations. I love the dice, and all were high quality. The tokens all came out without ripping, which was awesome, so many other games, they tear. So much stuff in this game, but overall, the rules were easy to understand. I love this game a lot and can say it's great fun to play with friends.

title: Fun desk toy
text: Great fun to play with while things load on the computer or I just need a few minutes to rest my eyes. I liked having extras to give out as gifts. Can be quite mesmerizing to watch the colors flow.

title: Very high quality playmats
text: I loved this so much when I got it. It's print quality was so much better than I expected and the overall quality was everything I was hoping for. I 100% recommend anything by this brand. I've even got several more from this brand and they have all been equally exceptional. Beautiful images as well, I'm just hoping they expand their choices even more.

title: Great fun
text: Great fun, both to put together, and to use. It's always fun to show off to people as well. It took a long time to make, but I love making things like this, so for me, it's nice that it gave me a lot of build time. I think it would be a great gift for anyone who likes putting things together.

title: Great fun
text: A fun game with cool art. I love the design and the box, all the included bits and pieces. I love that it's so small but is still so much fun. The game was pretty easy for me to get a hang of, but not my friend, so I play it mostly by myself, and I can't tell you how happy it makes me that they made a game with a single player set of rules; you really just don't ever find that.

title: Stunning
text: Absolutely beautiful and cool dragon, I love mine so much. Everything I needed was included. It was also so much fun to put together. My paper wings however came creased and crumpled in some parts, and so don't look good, and there really isn't anything to do about that. Would have got a full five stars if the wings had been in good shape.

title: Cool at first
text: Very cool at first actually, but that quickly wore off. They aren't balanced at all. Since they have batteries, one day those will die, and since you can't replace them, they'll be useless. They turn on so easily that just walking by the table they are on turns mine on, and I worried how quickly the batteries would die on me, turns out, after only a few months. So these are really just a gimmick at the moment. Hopefully they can make these better, but for now, only get as a novelty.

title: LOVE these sleaves
text: These sleeves are perfect for me and my cards (mostly Magic the Gathering). They fit great and are super clear, much better than normal penny sleeves in every way. Well, two penny sleeves in this case, but still, highly recommended and I will be buying more for sure.

title: I may love this a little too much
text: Crazy good deal, I have recommended this to all my friends that play TTRPGs. Getting two really good double sided maps with distinct/different images on them alone is a good deal, but then you also get the dry erase markers, which were really nice quality btw, reusable vinyl stickers plus eraser and a nice sturdy box to keep it all in. The box is large enough you could easily include a ton more stuff in it and the box doubles as more set pieces! Four more in total to be exact. Yeah, I use mine almost all the time, and it looks pretty cool when not in use.

title: Could so easily be a five star product
text: Very high quality mat. It erases easily and it is very tough, lays flat and is a good size as well. But.. Why are both sides exactly the same? Well, one side is just very slightly lighter. I don't get why they would bother. Usually maps like these have sides that are different, but this one isn't really. I notice that most of their maps do that too. They could really sell half as many maps as they do now, and they'd be twice as useful if they just combined them. As of now, I just see this as a, practicality wise, one sided map.

title: Beautiful set
text: Have been playing since I was a kid on an old cardboard set, and finally got an upgrade. It's a huge upgrade too, such a beautiful set with everything needed and it all stores inside the case perfectly. It looks and feels high quality, and has stood up to a lot of play and still looks just as good. Highly recommended.

title: Really great to have on hand
text:
A great asset to have, it's good for when players suddenly derail the campaign, or for quick quests when they are done with what you had planned for the day and you have time to kill. Really, their use is only limited by your imagination.

I do however wish there were more NPC cards though. You go through so many NPCs in just one big campaign, I really feel there needs to be at least double. I would love to see some pretty huge NPC packs come out from this company. The box is a nice presentation, and the cards are really good quality. Love the art on the NPCs a lot.

My only real complaint about this set is the money, fifty dollars for cards seems a bit much, even if they are really great cards. I mean, you don't even save anything really buying the genesis version over the other sets individually. Although, you do get some nice bonus cards, including four NPCs, which I did say you need more of. Ultimately, I'd still recommend this to most anyone.

title: Great for young kids
text: Memory is a great game to play with your kids, but they tire of it pretty soon. This twist on memory however has reignited the fun they used to have and has kept it going. It's nice to have some added rules and complexity. There is also some randomness in there as well to keep things fresh and exciting.

title: Pretty dice for cheap
text: A great price for dice in a fun variety of colors. It's good to have extra dice or you can gift the extras to your friends. Either way, they roll well. I liked the bag it came with as well, great for my hoard of new dice.

title: A lot of fun for my kids
text: Pretty fun game, that is easy to learn. A good mix of both strategy and luck. I like how it's fairly unique compared to what I already had. Comes with a lot of cool extras and figures, though the swords on some of the figures are quite bent. Short enough to not get boring for those with short attention spans.

title: Kids loved it
text: Pretty cool little set, with a cute design. Was loved by the kids, though they got very good at it, very quickly.

title: Very highly recommend
text: Extremely happy with these dice. Very high quality and everyone can tell, just by looking at them, and people will want to look at them. Very heavy, and roll well and evenly. One of the very best sets I own, and for a great price. Even the tin they come in is pretty cool.

title: Fun soft clay slime
text: Love the feel of this fluffy clay slime, as well as the color. It lasted a long while, but did eventually dry up sadly. Was fun to just knead and play with while killing time. The container is good to reuse for your own homemade slimes.

title: Good amount
text: Great shrink plastic, worked perfectly. Lots of it to work with and do so many projects with. The frosted side made it work much better with colored pencil. It's always fun to make things with this stuff.

title: Magnificent looking
text: So much fun to put together, and it looks so good on display. This has been worth every penny. I read other peoples reviews saying theirs broke when it was fired, so I have never fired mine. The rubber bands do eventually degrade, as rubber does over time, but since I don't ever use it, it's fine, I just replaced them with thin twine which looks even more realistic.

title: Cool product that needs upgrades to design
text: Really hard to not give this five stars, as it is really cool. But the slot for the deck won't let you use sleeved cards, and everyone uses sleeved cards. I wouldn't suggest sticking your cards in this unsleeved, you'd have to tip it upside down to get the last few cards out every time. The dials also, I don't like where they are positioned, as I can't see them unless I stand over it. It is really cool though, and if you stain or paint the wood, then it would only look that much cooler. I hope the company that makes this upgrades it one day, then I'd give it five out of five.

title: A great concept, but can be improved
text: They are cute, and the materials and craftsmanship are quality. But the flaps take up half of the space when you zip them up, so they hold very little. Plus, they won't stay open like it shows in the picture. Ultimately, very bulky and not practical, especially for the high price for four tiny containers.

title: Board arrived coming up from surface
text: The metallic board with the grid pattern in basically a thin metal sheet sticker, and it came peeling up. I keep pushing it down, but it just keeps coming right back up. That makes it look ugly, and the corners and edges of the metal are very sharp. The entire thing came very dirty, and every single stone had to be washed, as well as their containers. Several of the stones have their magnets glued in very haphazardly, and they don't rest flat, and some magnets fell out, although that was quick and easy to fix. But I can't get the board to stay down, and that's really upsetting.

title: OK balloons, but there are better
text: Covered in what I think was dirty grease, I had to wipe a lot of these off. Almost all of mine are the copper color as well. They are very metallic looking though and I love that so much. But they only last a day before deflating and that's just ridiculous. For parties though, where no one is expecting them to last longer, they'll be fine.

title: A cute little set
text: This is a cute mini version of a lego set I'd love to have, but could never afford. This set however, is very affordable, and does good for the price. Because it's mini, it doesn't take up as much space. It looks good enough that I've left it put together to be on display for a while.

title: A good basic binder
text: A good price for a basic binder. 400 cards is quite a lot and I'm glad I have somewhere to hold them all. Plus, it's dragon is a cool design that isn't bound to any one brand of cards. All in all, it's been a good buy and I quite enjoy it.

title: Love the thick handles
text: These are great handles, nice strong metal with protective caps. That's pretty standard though, what makes me really love these is the handles, they are much larger than average, and are so much more comfortable to hold for long periods. If I need more, I'll definitely consider these first.

title: Good quality but not really suitable for kids. Definitely don't let them watch the show!
text:
DISCLAIMER:
This is themed after the very adult Squid Games show which I do NOT recommend kids watching- it's not just like some horror movie, it's actually pretty twisted and has extreme graphic violence/ shootings. People compete in several rounds and the final person standing wins a giant cash prize, everyone else dies some horrible death along the way and if you try leaving, you get shot.

QUALITY:
The quality of these pieces are really good and they're pretty comparable to Lego! They're Lego compatible and snap together and pull apart like they should. I put the set together easily and everything stays together as it should.

As an adult I think this is amazing! I just don't encourage it to be bought for kids as they'd be curious about playing the game in real life, possibly with any guns parents have laying around. So please lock up the guns and don't let your kids play with this or watch the series. I'm not some crazy anti gun person, I own several. I just know that weird shows like this plus guns laying around- absolutely can lead to something bad so just lock up the guns please and don't let your kid have anything to do with this series. NOT appropriate for kids at all.

title: Lots of fun!
text:
Was easy to set up and get going and even us adults had a blast playing with it! The kids eventually got tired of us playing and had to take it away though.

The guns work well and the sound function works as it should when you shoot the ball into it's mouth. Seems pretty well made. A good quality toy!

title: Beautiful carriage
text: This was so much fun to put together and I love the set so much. Very magical looking and looks like it just came from a fairy tale story. Looks great on display and was reasonably priced. Nothing broke, no splinters and it had all it's parts. Everything really needed was included and I can't imagine anyone not loving it.

title: Expensive for a night light
text: Very expensive night light. You can get the lego set for five bucks, which makes the nightlight twenty-five. For a night light, that seems a bit much. Of course, it is cool looking so I guess it could be worth it, but keep in mind, the middle of the night light is just card stock (The back isn't even covered and looks very ugly), so little kids will ruin it quickly, best to give it to an older kid that takes care of their stuff. I do like that it is touch sensitive though.

title: It could have al least included a minifig
text: I don't really get this product. These pencils aren't very good, not bad, but crayola is better, and these cost fifteen bucks. Because they are lego branded? Is that one lego piece they give you why it costs so much money? If this was priced according to what it is (subpar pencils with a single lego brick) then I'd say definitely yes, but for fifteen bucks; no. You can get them a real set of lego and some crayola pencils for that price, which would be a much better gift in my opinion.

title: Good quality dice
text: The dice are great, but the instructions garbage. Just make your own rules, they'll make more sense and be fun. The dice themselves are good quality, just plastic cubes with pictures on them. I played with them for a long time, and the pictures look just as good as new, so I expect they'll last close enough to forever. It's a nice game that is very small and takes up almost no space at all.

title: Pretty good cards
text: I will go ahead and agree with another review I happened to see, and say that the box is much better looking than the cards. lol But still, the cards are decent quality, and the art unique, so worth keeping in my opinion. The art is shown in the pictures on the page, so you'll be able to see if you like it or not before you buy. Cards are the standard poker quality, great shuffle and feel and have stood up pretty well to a lot of play.

title: Great quality black sleeves
text: Really loved these sleeves. So much so, I bought them three more times since I first got them. One batch was missing sixteen sleeves, and had six badly damaged ones, but all the others have been perfect. Very high quality for the price, nice opaque back and very clear front. I have loved these for my cards and plan to continue using them. As well, it's almost impossible to find black sleeves, as that color is always sold out in every brand year round, so that alone makes these gems in the rough.

title: Very cool spinner
text: I hate the price, but find it understandable, as it's such high quality. It looks so cool too. It also came with a uv light, which I really liked. It spins for a good amount of time, as well as glows for a long time. It's fairly heavy for a fidget spinner.

title: Great spinner
text: Hate the price, but it's understandable, as everything else about this is just perfect. The quality is so high, and it looks and feels like it is. It also came with a uv light, which was nice. The glow lasts a long time as does it's spin.

title: Best to use for a costume or just decoration
text: Just fine cards. Printing was ok, paper could have been better, it was on the thin side. This really seems to have been a set made for decoration, or maybe to accompany a Halloween outfit, not made to really be used. I do wish that had been stated. You can get much better.

title: Cute fairy tale princess set
text: Very cute set. Perfect for young kids that love little building blocks. Was easy to put together and goes well with many of legos princess sets or even just on it's own, it's very nice. The stickers all stuck well, I suggest taking the time to line them up right for your kids, because they aren't made to come up once you use them.

title: Was enjoyed by the kids
text: The kids loved this paper, and that says it all. The size I thought at first small, but I've actually found it to be better than standard paper size. Loved the included stencils.

title: Pretty set of dice
text: So pretty, bright shiny silver and a cool blue effect in the enamel. Not sure how they did it, but it does look really cool and I love this set. They are fairly heavy, and roll evenly. The numbers are easy to make out

title: Fantastic quality
text: Very pretty dice. The metal is bright and shiny, the colors really clear and the numbers are easy to read. They are very heavy, and roll evenly.

title: Great stylish dice
text: Great, heavy dice. Love the colors, and the numbers stand out and are easy to read. No defects or problems and they rolled evenly.

title: Huge play set
text: Kids really loved this, and have been playing with it a lot for a long time now. It's an awesome little toy. But I have a couple places where they could improve. The tube and slides tend to snap when pulled out, because they are so tight. The magnets could be stronger.

title: Good kit, poor instructions
text: The parts themselves are good quality, and this would be a good set to use, but better if you can read Chinese. There are two sets of instructions, one in English, and they are awful, and a good set, that's in Chinese. I found the time it was taking to translate the good instructions to not be worth it, and just wish they had given the good instruction in both languages. Still though, all the pieces worked perfectly.

title: Cool looking dice
text: A good looking set of steampunk dice. Exactly what I needed at the time. I like how easy the dice are to read. Balanced rolling and they have a very nice, heavy feel to them. Could easily recommend these.

title: Really cool sets
text: These sets are super cool, but they also work together, which I really like. Lots of nice bright colors, except for the tan one. Considering how many options you have in what to make with them, they entertain for a very long time, and then after that, can be used free form to make whatever you can think of. I don't like that several of the pieces are just a little too tight, or a little too loose, they cost too much for that. But for a kid, these are a great set of dinosaur robots.

title: Very standard keeper
text: Very standard, good at what it's supposed to be good at. Looks quite nice and sleek. Is a standard price as well, you really can't go wrong with this. What I like most is the variety, the ability to choose between so many cool colors. I feel plenty confident with my tradable cards in it, that nothing will happen to them, and it keeps them all in one place.

title: Long lasting glow
text: Beautiful green dice with a well balanced roll. Easy to read, even in the dark as the glow so brightly. They charge up best with a black light, but even regular light will work, and the glow lasts a good while. These have been very fun to play with lately.

title: So gorgeous
text: What a stunning decorative piece, I love it so much. It took a long time to put together, but was worth it and the whole process was very fun. Putting things like this together is my jam, but that I get something so nice at the end of it makes it that much better. 100% percent recommend it. It will always get mentioned first time someone sees it as well, so it makes a good conversation starter.

title: Very cool looking
text: It's nice and weighty, plus, very cool looking. It does not spin for very long though (much less than a minute), and mine wobbles a bit. For 40 bucks, I would expect it to be better than that. It is still cool though, I guess you just have to keep spinning it or just use it as a paper weight.

title: A good set of dice for class theming
text: Very pretty dice, and go well with the chosen class. The colors are nice and the inclusions are cool. They seem to be well balanced despite the inclusion in each die, I suppose they are light enough to not really affect them too much. The paint however is dodgy on my set, and has some small chips and quite a few air bubbles.

title: Makes sudoku easier and more fun
text: I love having this thing to do my sudoku on. I like having more tangible pieces to place than just a pen, and pen can't be picked up if you put the number in the wrong place. Having the drawer was a great idea for storage. Plus it comes with some sudoku of it's own. A great gift for someone that loves sudoku or wants to get into it.

title: Very icy looking blue and silver dice
text: Beautiful shiny dice. Very easy to read and they roll well. Heavy and high quality, all the dice were in perfect shape. A great set to be sure.

title: Good for a quick gift
text: Quite a fun assortment of fidget toys. Would be good to use as stocking stuffers. In my set, the fidget pad controller was broken and I wasn't able to fix it sadly. The rubik cube has a lot of colors that are too close together and make it a little more difficult to play with. The rest were all in good shape.

title: Perfect dice!
text: Super colorful and very easy to read. They roll well and evenly. I love the design, it's the first I've ever seen like it and really, it's just so perfect for so many characters and campaigns. A must-have for sure.

title: Pretty good dice
text: These are nice all copper dice, very heavy and roll well. A little plain for being all one color but still look cool because of the unique design on them. They go well with any medieval setting, or just for anyone that loves copper.

title: Beautiful clock! Fairly easy to assemble.
text: This was somewhat easy to put together, nothing too complicated. The quality of this is great. Works like it should and is a beautiful unique piece!

title: Good value display, fits a ton of figures!
text: This thing holds a LOT of minifigs! The quality is pretty decent and the price is fair for what it is. Overall I'm happy and will be getting a couple more!
