title: Great dice
text: Very beautiful combination of blue and silver. The dice are stunning, heavy and look great. They are also well balanced. The dice came in perfect shape and have stood up to a lot of rolling. I like the bag that comes with the dice, it's cool.

title: Great childhood memories
text: Had these when I was a kid and am happy to have them again. Very fun, and very relaxing as well. I like to hear and feel the clicks as I move them about. Not too many shapes you can make with these, but coming up with new stuff was always part of the fun for me.

title: Very large and fun set
text:
A fun kit to put together with a cool set to play with once you're done. Perfect for any kids that love space. So long as they can follow very basic instruction, they can do this set by themselves just fine. Though it will take a while to put together, as it is very large. I loved how long it took to put together myself, as that's one of the best parts, but young kids will probably want help.

Most of the pieces fit well, but a few were a little off, which I would hope for better, but none were bad enough to fall apart and everything feels sturdy enough once fully assembled. The stickers in my set were folded in half and that makes a lot of them not go on, so that's why I didn't rate a full five stars.

title: Very cool design
text: Beautiful, but fragile puzzle. Because of the little animal shapes, and the one big wolf, most of the pieces don't actually hold to anything, making this puzzle much more difficult to put together. That however is my only complaint, as the puzzle is very nice otherwise. The end result is worth the time it takes to put together and ultimately was very fun. The wood was very think for a puzzle and I feel the pieces are sturdy and would never break with normal use.

title: Cool looking dice
text: Heavy metal dice, with good balance. They look cool and the colors are great. The numbers are very easy to read because of the contrast. They are great quality and have stood up to a lot without wear. I like that they came with a soft bag to keep them in.

title: Light metal dice.
text: Good dice with even balance. They are easy enough to read and are sturdy. They are pretty light for metal dice, so a big plus to those who hate the weight of the full metal dice. I haven't heard any wind chimes while rolling these.

title: Very cool looking map and tube
text: Great basic map, that can cover virtually any basic setting. It does need help staying flat, as it likes to try and curl back up, but that's the sole flaw I can find, and its easy to deal with. The marker it came with was very juicy and is still going, even after all this time, which is nice. The tube it came in is very cool looking and I actually now use it to store all my maps like the one it came with.

title: Very fun and relaxing
text: It's a lot like kinetic sand, though I like the colors more. It feels a little bit different, if you squeeze it, its harder than kinetic sand, but when it flows, I feel its a little bit softer. Ultimately though, although the product itself is perfectly fine, it does cost a whole lot more than other brands do, and I don't feel it's really any better. I'd most recommend it if you really like the colors and or mold it comes with.

title: Pretty darn cute
text: Holds all kinds of cards just fine, from yugioh to MtG and pokemon. I love the zipper on it, its what really keeps your cards secure and it doesn't feel cheap at all. The pages themselves have held up well, I've not had any splits or tears anywhere. All in all, a great place to keep a small collection of your cards.

title: A beautiful set for those looking for art that resonates with them
text:
These tarot cards are more for the art than actual use. I'll start with the art; it's very good, reminds me of soft anime. The theme stays consistent throughout the cards and they are all very nice to look at. However, they are missing some symbology, not that that is a big deal. If you know what the cards mean to you, then you don't need any symbols after all.

Now, for the technical issues I have with this set, XI Strength and VIII Justice are switched, Page of cups is misspelled as Pace, There are eleven cups on the ten of cups, seven swords on the eight of swords and many of the wands are missing a wand from their image, but it may be they are all off on the side where the border covers them, in which case, that is also likely what happened with the eight of swords. Though I wish the artist took that into account when making either the image, or the border.

I like the items that come with the cards well enough. Not the highest quality, but fine for beginners and they do look nice. Overall, I hope they make improvements to the cards and I still rate them fairly highly, as they are mostly for the art, and the art is very nice.

title: Extremely fun toys
text: Always had fun with these growing up and I've not met a kid that didn't love them. I highly recommend this. However, this brand does have one problem, the colors are random. I got mostly pastel pink and purple, with lots of yellow. Only like, four blue pieces and red and green were sparse as well. Because they are random though, it could just as easily be the other way around. Keep that in mind if you buy.

title: They last forever
text: 240 glow sticks really last longer than I thought they would. They are a good bit of fun, and add ambient glow when needed. Mostly used in pictures, but they came in handy at Halloween and a recent birthday party. Also, I was bored enough one day to go ahead and count them, and there were 244 in my package; score.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful, but hard to read half the cards. The images on the site are fantastic, but the cards I got were far darker, and I can't really see what the clubs and spades are without more effort than you should have to give for cards. I know these are mostly made for the art interested card collectors though, not seriously intended for every day play. So if you are interested with playing with them, the company makes these in brighter colors and I'd recommend those over these, but for looking at, they sure are great.

title: Decent price
text: You get a decent amount for what you pay, and it is really fun to play with. It's a (for me) new and unique texture. It does not stick to itself like sand, but it is fun to squish over and over. It's hours of fun that won't dry out. I do also like how well the container it comes in stays shut.

title: Very fun
text: Lots of fun to be had playing with this. My favorite part is that it has no static electricity, so it stayed in the tray it was put in to play with, and right back into the container without mess. The glow isn't blindingly bright, but it was as bright as glow toys tend to be, and was an added bonus to it. The container mine came in was badly cracked, but it did hold the contents still.

title: Stunning crystal for display
text: A really beautiful crystal that looks great on display. It was really fun to do and easy as well. Just following the very easy directions yielded a perfect crystal. But if it does fail on you, it can easily be dissolved into water again and then you can try as many times as needed. The instructions also had some basic scientific info on crystals that would be fun for younger kids. The sample of fluorite included with my kit was small and broken.

title: The music box was nice
text: The wood parts went together well enough. A little too tight, but I know they'll hold pretty much forever. The only problem I had with the gramophone was the top bit, as the pieces didn't go together very well, and it took a lot of force and bending the wood in ways it didn't want to go to get it all together and look nice. But I did get it to look nice, and that's what matters to me. The music box itself was decent for the price. Keep in mind, it's not a wind up and that you have to manually turn it for it to play music.

title: A good binder for your collections
text: Classy sleek black binder; it looks good and it does a great job of holding your cards. The plastic used inside is very clear and won't inhibit viewing at all, and I like that it is side loaded, as it does keep the cards a little safer than traditional top loading binders. I could have done without the large logo on the cover though.

title: Fun to pretend to be rich
text: Truly beautiful play money. Frankly, too nice as I don't want to use it now. lol But seriously, it is great to have, as it can spice up traditional games, or be used for made up games where you'd have to supply your own fake money. I use it for table top role playing games and everyone always loves it. Only things I could consider to suggest, is printing it on thicker paper, as it is really fragile, I wouldn't give this to kids if you want it to stay nice; and to maybe have less pink and add in other colors.

title: Great kids game with quality control issues
text:
For the game itself, it's fun and can easily keep kids entertained. There is plenty to do and enough randomness that it really can last for a long, long time. Definitely too easy for adults to get much out of it, but interesting enough you could play along with your kids while they learn it. It comes with four plastic figures, gems, lots of tokens and tons of cards, plus a very nice bag to put it all into.

When mine came, the instructions and score pad were hanging half way out of the box when they closed the lid, badly damaging the lid, box, score pad and instructions. The plastic purple figures (Skylar) arm was broken. Everything else though was in good shape.

title: Great game, could use better quality control
text:
The game itself is pretty fun. It's quick to learn for a strategy card game and fun to play. A good variety in cards means no two games are really ever going to be exactly the same. There really isn't anything bad I can think of to say about the game play itself, I've had nothing buy fun playing it and I have played it a lot. The art work is all very nice and fitting to the setting.

There were however some quality issues with my set. Four of the same card is misprinted with the wrong type written, which was quite confusing and took some time to figure out. When packaged, the cards are split into two slots in a tray for storage, and then plastic gems added in one of the two slots. The gems are very sharp and pokey, and there was so little room, the gems stabbed the top card a whole bunch, which makes it look very ugly and you can tell what card it is before it's even drawn. This could have been easily fixed by putting more cards in one slot, as there was plenty of room, and then the gems wouldn't have been pressed so hard into the cards they were with. Lastly, my game board was misglued, and looks really bad, and it's the side you play on of course. Though, it is still useable.

I still would recommend it though, I don't see anyone else mention the problems I have with my set, so I'm sure it'll be fine, and none of those problems prevent play. As I said above, it is very fun.

title: Really cute games
text: These games are really cute and a lot of fun! Decently made. Make cute decorations when not playing them too!

title: Great for kids
text: The gems themselves aren't anything special, but the kit is very fun and educational. It has a booklet with lots of facts and the box can be used for display or storage. This is highly recommended for anyone with young kids that love gems and would like a start on their collection. Most of the stone are at the top, which makes them not too hard to find, since kids don't have patience. But one gem did have paint on it that took work to get off of it.

title: I now have poop on display
text: Coprolite or fossilized dino poop is not something I ever thought I'd own, but now I do and it's hilarious. The rest of the fossils are also awesome. The fossils are clumped together in three separate places, and they are right at the top, which not only made it so I found them all in just a few seconds, it resulted in one of the fossils being spray painted blue, and I can't get that off. But that is my sole complaint. Lots of good reading material with facts about your new fossils and a nice box to display them or just store them.

title: Broken trilobite
text:
All of the fossils were in a single spot, and it took only a second to find them. I soaked the block in water, as I didn't want to take hours to dig them out, and after a little bit, I was able to pull the fossils out of the block with ease. I got this kit specifically for the trilobite, as I have always wanted one and didn't have one yet. So imagine my dismay when my new trilobite is crumbling to pieces in front of me. It couldn't have been damaged by my not digging correctly, as I didn't even dig at all.

I looked it over and I was upset to find spots that had been glued together. That tells me they knew it was coming apart when they included it. I guess they thought it was going to go to a kid who would just assume they broke it by being careless and would just throw it out and not care, but I personally don't like that they included a piece that was crumbling. There are other reviews that have the same problem with their trilobite crumbling and there are also others with pictures of the same.

The other fossils are all fine, and if you don't care at all about the trilobite, then I guess this kit is still ok to get. But I can't bring myself to recommend it to anyone because they knowingly included a broken and glued back together fossil.

title: Looks great on display
text:
Love how many different colors this can do, gone are the days of having to get one lightsaber in each color. Lots of sound effects, though my favorite is just when you hit something with the blade; very nostalgic. The handle is a heavy metal and the blade is plastic. It comes with screws to hold the blade in place. Very fun to play with and looks so good on display. This is so far, the nicest looking lightsaber I own.

Keep in mind the instructions though, it took an hour or two to fully set up. When I first turned it on, it was flashing rapidly and making a headache inducing shriek for a very long time before I could make it stop. The instructions are crazy hard to understand, and you program it by clicking a button a certain number of times, after holding the button for a certain amount of time, based on what mode it is in and what mode you want to get to and then cycle through that modes different settings, and since I had no idea what settings it had when it came to me, I had to spend a very long time figuring out what all it's settings were, and how to then change each of those settings.

title: A beautiful and massive set
text: My favorite thing about block sets is putting them together, but they always go by so quickly. Not this one though, it took a very long time to complete and I had fun the whole time. I had no missing pieces and even a few spare pieces, which was nice. Everything went together and holds well. There are no minifigs in this set.

title: Fun toy, decent quality. Pad not included, pretty pricey altogether.
text:
Pad not included in this. Quality is decent. Assembly was simple enough but the price is a bit up there for a few pieces of wood and nothing else.

Overall it's a fun toy though and the kids love it!

title: Fun treat bag kit!
text: We only see a handful of kids trick or treating so we got these to do gift bags for all of the ones that do show up! The bags are super cute and it was a lot of fun putting these all together for them! Good quality bags at a good price!

title: Lots of figures included
text: Although they don't say in the description or show in the pictures, it comes with six figures, which I really loved, one of them was even male, which is nice, as with the lego friends sets, those are extremely rare. The set went together well and looks just like it does in the pictures. I had a few spare pieces and none were missing. The instructions were a tiny bit unclear in a couple places, but it was pretty easy to figure out.

title: Not squishy
text: These are kind of cute, and pretty popular apparently. But I'm not personally sure why. They aren't great quality, the sewing leaves much to be desired, the squishy isn't squishy and everything was so tightly sewn in place, that I ended up with holes in the pieces trying to get them separated. The original Squishmallow was far better.

title: Nice to have different colors
text: Great for hand exercising and just fiddling with when bored. It feels good to work my arthritic hands with this stuff. It starts out hard but quickly softens in my hands. I have no complaints about the product itself, although it does seem like a high price compared to many other brands of the same stuff here on Amazon.

title: Amazingly huge float!
text:
I LOVE the size of this! So man floats are very narrow and don't fit a person who's not a tiny stick figure. I'm not even just talking overweight, if you have a wide bone structure and broad shoulders- it's fun trying to find a raft you're not hanging over the edges with! This one works perfectly for that and floats really well!

I've used it many times and I wished I'd gotten one years ago! We will definitely be buying a 2nd one! It's very sturdy and seems to be great quality.

title: LOVE the Pacman design on this one and the lights! This machine is amazing!
text:
Well made arcade machine with beautiful art and lights on it! The joysticks and buttons all work perfectly. The thing has many many games including most of your favorites! The games all seem to play perfectly and I've had no issues at all! Great quality console!

I prefer to get these premade ones as programming arcade machines is just beyond me! So these are worth it for what you pay!

title: Kind of cheaply made but a cool toy and fun decoration!
text:
This game and the others that come in this series are all fun to play! This one was a lot of fun and when I was done with it- I put it on my display shelf with my Mario stuff and it makes for a cute decoration!

Plastic is slightly on the cheap side but I don't think these are that expensive so that's to be expected.

title: Fun game that doubles as a neat desk or shelf decoration
text: I put this on my Nintendo shelf and pull it down to play with it every now and again but for the most part it's just an adorable decoration in my room! The game is basic and sort of fun. It's well enough made and a very cute toy!

title: Good lookin dice
text: Great metal dice for a great price. I got two sets and each were perfect. They roll evenly and are a nice hefty weight, while looking good for nearly any character you can think of. The tin has been nice to have for both storing and taking them to games night.

title: So holo and shiny
text: Originally, they had no pics on this listing, and I was going to say they needed them to do this item justice. Now that they have them, I can tell you, it really is that stunning in person as in the pics. Very shiny and holo. Love the magnetic snaps, and that it's keeping my dice off the floor, while protecting my table.

title: Fun puzzle to put together
text: Very fun puzzle to put together. It had splashes of color all over, so you don't quite know where each piece will go. Very bright and colorful, I loved the image they chose. The pieces are standard size, and they were well made, and went together perfectly.

title: Very tiny
text: These are great quality, being very clear, perfectly round and no bubbles. But omg they are so tiny. Like a large marble, I just don't find them large enough to do much with. But if you are fine with their size, then I can't find any flaws with them.

title: It could have been great
text: The picture is very beautiful, but only on the box. On the pieces themselves, it's very pixelated making things hard to see. The pieces are also loose. Though, if it were only the fit of the pieces, I'd have been fine with it. I do like the box it comes in, and having all the individual compartments to put the pieces into. It took me a standard amount of time to put together and was neither easy nor difficult to do.

title: Great variety of humans
text: A great set to build up your army. Love how many joints they have; it makes it so easy to pose them however I want. Also, gotta say, love how many weapons this comes with, and how many different kinds of weapons; it really made my collection so much better.

title: Kind of dull looking but that's what "raw" means
text: The stones all look to be of good quality but they're very dull and would be boring to display or use as is. I recommend getting these for tumbling or if you just enjoy that dull unpolished look. Beyond that it seems to be a nice set!

title: Beautiful!!
text:
Absolutely beautiful! The barbie comes in the retail box with the clear window, is wrapped in tissue paper to protect it, then placed inside a thick factory brown cardboard box with the Barbie logo on it. When I got the Barbie out, her box was in perfect shape (I'm a collector so that's important.)

Her hair, her dress, everything- is stunning! Love the beautiful silver and white dress on this one. She's just absolutely adorable and I can't think of any room for improvement!

title: Fun set!
text: This set is well made and lots of fun to play with! Lots of nostalgia around Space Jam for me, I love it!

title: Nice collectors figure
text: Good quality collectors figure- I love it! Can't think of any room for improvement, just very happy with this!

title: Beautiful Holiday Barbie!
text: She comes with a stunning white and silver dress and the corset part is like a solid silver piece. (not crystals or gems sadly) Hair and makeup look great. They did great on the details of this Barbie and she's absolutely beautiful! Definitely a must have for your collection!

title: Stunning
text: A very cool dice tower, the best one I own. It works well, was quick and easy to put together and will look epic once I get around to painting it. It is pretty sturdy as well, and I love so much that it folds up, saving room. It's also nice enough to not fold up and just leave out as a bit of TTRPG décor.

title: Lovely blue
text: Good balance in these, and a beautiful blue color with lots of sparkle. These are a great set and I like the price as well. They are very easy to read.

title: A good starter set
text: A very magical in appearance set of dice. It's beautiful and rolls well. Made of the standard kind of resin you expect. They're a good set to get if you like the look.

title: Beautiful
text: Good balance in these dice. They rolled well and looked good while doing it. One of my fav sets of resin dice. Too few out there have silver numbers.

title: Well made and just adorable!
text: This Cars set is just adorable!! I'm an adult and got them because I just loved Cars, I'm super thrilled with these and have them on a display shelf! Never too old for toys! Well made and very cute set!

title: Beautiful and cool
text: A unique set of cards that are very fun to play with. Good quality all around. Flawless shuffle and feel. I could find no fault with these in any way, shape or form. Highly recommended.

title: I am in love with this ship!!
text: This was a blast to build and the final product is just absolutely amazing!!! I love this ship! Really easy to build and the final product is soo cool! Great fun for kids and adults! I honestly had no problems with this ship kit and have no complaints!

title: For small to medium sized heads
text:
I think I have an average sized head for man but this thing does NOT fit me. I squeezed it on and the rivets in it and nose pieces were just stabbing me and the whole thing was just WAY too tight. Could barely manage to get it off!

I was able to test out the mouth first though, it moves great with jaw movement and comes with a foam chin pad that isn't attached so you can decide if you want to pull the sticky backer off of it and attach it or not. The eyes are easy enough to see out of and the nose part is easy to breathe out of but being as the mask is a bit too small, the eyes and nose both kind of jabbed into my face and made the mask that much more uncomfortable! Definitely won't be able to wear glasses with these and if it's tight on you like it is me, you'll be hard pressed to wear contacts without this thing knocking those out!

Not happy with this mask at all sadly, don't know why it's so tiny!

title: Mad libs meets cards against humanity
text: We have played this a couple times now and think it's a new party favorite- it's an absolute hit and is hilarious! We had a little too much fun with this and it turned dirty quick with a bunch of adults playing it! Haha. The game is neat though because you can make it dirty if you want or you can keep it clean for the family, it's whatever you make of it! Tons of fun!

title: Lots of fun!
text: These gems and fake gold pieces are a lot of fun! They look really neat in a pirate chest that I put them in! I'm an adult and still enjoy playing with things like this and don't care who knows it. :P I highly recommend these, just lots of fun to be had here!

title: Fun little handheld game, does come with pokemon games as promised
text: Came with the pokemon games, you just have to poke around and find them in the system is all. Tons of games so it's hard to sift thru them all. But I love that it has a great amount of games! Honestly I feel this would be better priced at $20-$25, as the $40 it's listed at now is a bit much for the cheap handheld system. YES it works but it is on the cheaper side and they absolutely could put this at a lower price point considering none of these games are legally licensed and they didn't have to pay for them. The only cost they're out is the little handheld system that probably cost them $5 to make so the price point is a little inflated in my opinion. The handheld does work though and it is a lot of fun to play!

title: Tons of games!
text: Works perfectly and comes with a ton of games! Love this system! Works well with no glitches that I've seen.

title: Fast n fun!
text: These little cars are a lot of fun! Handle well and go fast, love it!!

title: These little cars are actually really amazing!
text: I was surprised at how much fun for an adult these were- I had a lot of fun with them! They go really fast and actually handle really well! Good quality little cars!! Tons of fun!

title: LOVE these coins!
text: Great quality, look amazing!!! They're very well made coins that are very sturdy/ not gonna break at all if you wanted them to. Feel so much nicer in your hands than cheap plastic coins! I feel like a real pirate with these!

title: Nice pirate coins!
text: These are really nice, well made coins that look and feel amazing! I don't know what they're made of- they leave a strange metallic smell on your hands if you handle them for a minute... Other than that they're perfect and we love them!

title: I never thought I'd have my hands on such a realistic copy of the game, this is AMAZING!!
text:
I'm blown away at this game, especially for the price point! The only room for improvement I can see is for them to offer a wooden version, I'd happily pay extra! But at this price point- zero complaints, this game is fantastic!

When you unfold the game it instantly starts the Jumanji drumming and then the little screen in the middle starts swirling around in a green vortex. It's actually a screen in there too! You push the dome and it drops you a hint, push it again and it'll tell you what the hint was describing.

We played a few rounds of this game and so far are just addicted! Very fun to play and they did an amazing job at it! The case looks amazing, the board looks amazing, the sound effects, real screen under the dome is amazing, just everything about this is great! The white dice are kinda on the cheap side, they don't even have indentions on them and the dots are kind of off centered. BUT dice are cheap, we just replaced them with a set we had laying around, problem solved! The game itself and how amazing the effects are far outweigh my complaints about basic white dice that are cheap to replace!

Overall I'm truly just blown away by this game!! My only feedback to the company is that they should offer a more premium wood cased one as a deluxe or special edition! People would buy it, I promise you! Thanks for bringing this bit of our childhood back to us, this game truly puts us back to the time when the first Jumanji movie came out! Rock on 90s kids!

title: Fun coins!
text: These are nice all metal coins that are a lot of fun to play with. Great quality and would make a nice pirate display too! Highly recommend!

title: Love these coins!
text: These are all metal and they're amazing looking! Look like real gold and silver coins! They have a little bit of a smell if you handle them for a while, not gross smelling, just a weird metal smell that comes off on your hands. Other than that they're perfect and I definitely recommend them!

title: LOVE these!
text: Definitely all metal and they're so awesome! I don't know what they're made of but they leave a kind of smell on your hand- not disgusting, just some sort of smell. Other than the smell these are perfect and I absolutely love them! Making a toy treasure chest and gonna put a ton of these and some glass gems in there. Highly recommend these!

title: Great slime
text: An insane amount of slime. It will last for what feels like forever. The add ins are great, and a include a wide variety, so you're bound to find something you love, but will likely love all of them. Good stretch, didn't smell toxic and didn't stick to hands as it was played with it. A good bulk buy price as well.

title: Great for kids
text: This would be so good for kids, to keep them busy making something and then they have something they can play with after. It's provided countless hours of fun. It's fun to use them in story telling and encourage them to do the same and see what they can come up with.

title: Cute lego plate set
text: Got these for a lego fanatic friend's birthday party and the set was a big hit- he loved it! The printing on these is vivid and clear, no pixelated horrible print jobs here. Just a really neat set, great quality!

title: Nice writing tablet
text: Really nice writing tablet! The pen writes perfectly on the screen with no flaws and the erase button works perfectly. Really neat tablet! No problems or complaints at all, very decent quality and great value!

title: Cute set!
text: This plate set is adorable! All of it feels a little cheap but for single use plates and cutlery, it's not the end of the world at all- just throwing it away after using it so don't need it to be made of steel or anything. The printing on this is all great, not pixelated or anything. Overall it's just a fun nice set!

title: Fun plate set!
text: Got this kit for a little cookout and it was fun to use! Very cute set!! The printing on it all looks amazing. The stuff is slightly flimsy but considering you're throwing it away after using it, it's not the end of the world. Definitely recommend these!

title: Cute stretchy toys
text: These are cute and well enough made. Kind of pricey but other than that they're great toys!

title: Lots of fun!
text: Lots of fun at a good price point! Very good value for this little toy! The controls are pretty responsive and it has a runtime that's average with all of these little drones. Overall I'm very happy with this and can't think of any room for improvement!

title: Cute plate set!
text: Very adorable beach party plate set! Very happy with everything in this package. It's kind of cheap feeling but the print on it is still pretty good so I'm happy with it overall.

title: Everything is sewn in place
text: Everything is sewn in place, and I didn't know that when I bought this. I tried to cut them out as gently as I could, but the threads were so tight against the floor of the house and the pets/accessories that I could barely get the scissors between them, and several now have holes in them. The cat was fairly misshapen and neither pets have memory foam in them which I also expected, considering all the previous squishmallows from this company.

title: Misshapen
text: Mine came very misshapen, they were not cute at all, and no where near as good quality as I usually expect. They actually were kind of ugly with how lumpy they were and I couldn't tell what a couple of them were supposed to be until I looked up a picture of them. And they aren't filled with the memory foam I thought they would be, like others from this same brand.

title: Perfect for cards
text: You can store even a very large deck in here and if it's smaller, you can also add in counters and a die. All the dimensions of this are perfectly sized. It looks and feels high quality, it lasts and lasts and still looks great as well. I love the added divider and magnets to make sure it stays shut when I want it to. Can't recommend this enough.

title: So shiny
text: I love how beautiful these dice are. The glitter and shine of the gold are wonderful and the dice themselves are heavy and roll well. They seem balanced to me, so all in all I highly recommend these dice.

title: Unique and very cool looking
text: Unique and very cool looking dice. Heavy as well and a good price for metal dice. There are so many classes and subclasses that could easily use these. They roll very well and seem evenly balanced. Definitely recommended.

title: Love the shimmer and sparkle
text: I got the green and black with orange numbers and they are very evil/halloween looking colors. They look fantastic, and are rolling well. Typical weight for resin die. They are a good price as well, so I do recommend.

title: Great to get for yourself or as a gift
text: This owl clock is so magnificent looking and just plain nifty. It was a blast to put together, and now that it is, it makes a great decoration. Anyone that sees it, loves it.

title: Beautiful dragon
text: This beautiful puzzle was really fun to work on and took a good amount of time to do. The wood was high quality and I had no problems with any of the pieces. Many of the pieces don't interlock, so you'll want this on a steady flat surface. But all of these puzzles like this are do that, so as much I dislike it, I won't remove a star for it. Over all, I still love and recommend it.

title: Awesome party set!
text: LOVE the 80s so had to grab this party set! Everything is pretty good quality and looks amazing! Love this set!

title: Wow! These are a lot nicer than I thought they'd be!
text:
So no these aren't high end race cars but we were super surprised in what we did get out of them! Very responsive steering on them and pretty quick! We have a blast driving them around the street and trying to avoid ramming into each other as we do circles in them. The range of the remotes are pretty impressive too, I can get the cars all the way down the street! Many cheaper cars lose range after a few short feet.

Overall, super impressed with these for their price point and what they are!

title: Fun to build
text: This music box is so fun to put together and so beautiful sounding as well. I really enjoy it and I think it could easily make a great gift as well. The pins are super hard to push into place, and I could barely manage it, but keep in mind I do have arthritis, so that may not be as much an issue for you. As well, a couple parts broke, but they had replacements of the parts that broke, thankfully.

title: Love this set!
text: Love this villains sorry game! Lots of fun to play and a nice item to have for those of us who can't get enough of the villains. Everything looks great, no damage to mine.

title: Great party set!
text: Love all the stuff this comes with, everything looks really nice! Definitely recommend.

title: Adorable fun doll
text: This Barbie is super cute and a lot of fun! Gave her to my friend's daughter and she enjoys the fact that it plays music and looks like a rock star. Definitely a great version of Barbie!

title: Great wand for the price
text: Wand is made out of plastic. For the price it's pretty good quality, looks nice! Comes in a super cute box. Definitely recommend.

title: Bag had a hole in it
text: It is indeed super soft, but mine had a hole in the bag, and so I didn't get to use much. What I did get to use was super soft and light, but also dried too quickly to be of much use to me for how I usually use air dry clay. Would be good for adding to slimes and for kids to just play around with.

title: Decent quality for the price (wand is plastic in case you were wondering)
text: Pretty decent quality for the price. Box is so nice that I'll probably just display it in the box :) The wand is made out of plastic which isn't a surprise at the price point. I am pretty happy with it overall, no complaints!

title: Awesome sets
text: Everything about these sets is awesome, from quality to color choices and how good they look when done. I love that it comes with two figures and vehicles so the kids can play together.

title: Love them!!
text: Well made and they all worked perfectly! They do feel a little cheap but considering the price and you get 3 of them, that's understandable. I've dropped them several times while playing with them and it hasn't broke them yet! They seem pretty durable.

title: Unusable joystick, it sticks non stop
text: The joystick sticks every single time to the top when trying to use it, very unimpressed with this thing overall. A couple of good games but not many. Screen is so so. Just cheap and I feel like it should be more at a $10 price point.

title: Diamond in the rough! Amazing little game system!
text:
I've tested out several of these handheld off brand game systems and many of them have screens that are unusable, screens that you can only see at one very specific angle, horrible audio, cheap controls, etc.

SO I was pleasantly surprised when I powered this one on and see a very vivid screen with good colors and clarity! Very impressed with the screen on this!! The audio is very clear and can get plenty loud. The controls are all very usable- no problems with them.

The way the games are sorted by system is impressive on this little console too. The games I've tried thus far all work well and are easy to play on this handheld.

Overall I definitely recommend this, it's a great quality, well made little handheld gaming console!

title: Looks awesome, smells so awful I had to stuff in the garage to aire out for a couple weeks
text:
Seriously- we had to stuff this in the garage a couple weeks to let it off gas, it came smelling AWFUL. It still smells a bit of chemicals.

Other than that bit, the mask looks really good! I love it!

title: Cheap guns
text: They're OK but very cheap thin plastic. I don't see them lasting more than a few uses before they fall apart. Not too impressed with these at all for the price point.

title: Beautiful bag but dividers not attached to the bottom so it's worthless
text: Without the dividers being attached at the bottom, your dice just mix together and this things pointless! Other than the divider issues, the bag is absolutely beautiful and good quality! Just need to fix that divider!

title: The animals were loved so much!
text: The animals ended up being the hit of this set, as I should have expected. But the Barbie herself was also loved, very high quality as is usual, but mostly because she was outdoorsy, which so is my daughter, and it's so hard to find toys that match her interests. This set will end up getting a lot of love and play.

title: Awesome figures
text: Great quality and a cool set. Anything in this line is always the best and loved so very much. The figures have many movable points and can be posed in almost any way, which is great. Everything about this set was perfect.

title: Ordered twice and they keep sending HALF of the dice.
text: We ordered the 12 dice and they sent 6. So we did a replacement order and again they ordered 6 (half of what we are supposed to have gotten) so now we have to return the original order and I'm stuck wondering what to do because the two orders finally make one order. This is just crazy.

title: Worth the money
text: I looked up the values of the cards I got and did the math; and the value (for what I got) matched exactly what these are being priced at right now. So not a great value, or a bad one. I got cards from many different sets, not just recent like some other lots do. No repeats, the cards were in good shape and no cards from other languages I can't read. It has a good mix of creatures, instants and sorceries. No lands, tokens or checklists. Very highly recommended for anyone that loves getting mystery cards.

title: So cute!
text: So much fun and so cute! I am absolutely going to have to get more. The little plastic potion bottles are fully reusable for other slimes, which just ups the value of this kit, and the larger bottle makes a great decoration. The wand can continue to get use for a long time as well, just overall packed with value and was loved so much, I am so happy with this product.

title: A great gift
text: A great gift for kids; the cute puppies were a big hit. Highly recommended for kids, but even more so for birthdays, it just fits. The plastic was of good quality and the dough was in great shape.

title: Adorable floof!
text: Such an adorable floofy black cat, I love this thing!!! It's my absolute favorite decoration for my bed now! Well made and just the cutest! Does indeed fluffy up very well, not some cheap thing that will stay flat or lumpy.

title: Fits well on an adult male head
text: Would probably be on the larger side for a smaller kids head but it's great for a man's head- fits my big head just right! Looks amazing, can't wait to wear it around and play jokes on people! Seems to be decent quality for the price point, I'm happy!

title: Definitely a "you get what you pay for" case!
text: Not too impressed with the quality of this at all, very cheap! Cheap plastic, cheap screen, horrible resolution. At the price point it's not surprising though. For the price, it's OK and it is usable still. Just not one of my favorite aftermarket game consoles I've reviewed, it falls into one of my least favorites.

title: One of the nicer ones I've tested
text:
So all of these handheld gaming systems from China are cheap, the price reflects this. That being said, this is the nicest looking and feeling one I've come across. Looks wise it reminds me a bit of a psp.

It has a good variety of games and is fun. Like any arcade thing from China, the games are a jumbled mess. If you're willing to navigate thru though, it's worth it. I have a lot of fun playing this and definitely recommend.

title: Can't even tell what's in the middle- very disappointing
text: You can't even tell they're skulls in the middle, very sad! Other than that fact, the outside of the dice looks nice and the paint job there is good. But the paint on the skulls are blobby and distorted. Very horrible quality.

title: Fun little kit!
text: We had a lot of fun doing these little skateboards! The kit was easy enough to do and the results were great! Definitely a great deal at the price these are selling for!

title: Well made, very nice collectibles!
text: These are exactly as pictured and I absolutely love them! They're smaller figures (as their listing shows.) These are good quality figures and all look amazing! I'm collecting all of them that they're putting out and can't wait to see the rest! So much nostalgia with Space Jam stuff!

title: Cool cars, great price
text: Ten really great cars for a great price. The cars were unique and very interesting, being unlike any of the ones I see at the store normally. They are a good quality, like the rest of their cars. This is good idea for encouraging kids to do chores around the house and start them on the path to being able to take care of themselves and do the right things without having to always keep on them. Although I think you can also just use regular hot wheels for that as well, as I said, the cars in this set are really cool and unique.

title: Poor spread of stones, poor coloration
text:
Many of the types of stones I only got one or a few of. The colors of the stones I got were so pale, it was hard to tell some of them apart. The blue quartz was barely blue at all, along with the amethyst, green aventurine and the jasper was more brown than red. My sodalite looks nothing at all like what was pictured.

About five of the stones had been smashed to pieces, I would suggest a smaller box in the future or adding in padding. Although it was mostly only the cheapest stones and barely any of the pretty ones, it is still two pounds of stones and they have a great many uses in crafts and decoration, etc.

Other stone collections have impressed me much more for the same price or less here on Amazon. I don't think I'd buy this again.

title: Better to use your own paints
text: Mine came in one piece, and I'm very happy with the end result. The paint is not bad or good, but usable, though there should be more of it. I'd just recommend using your own. The item itself is very nicely detailed and very cool looking. Nice and heavy as well.

title: A fun toy
text: Great fun, very basic but it has everything it needs and for the price, it can't be beat. Love that I get to choose what kind of wheels it has, very few cars do that. The lights are very bright, and will be easy to see outside. Perfect for younger kids just wanting a toy.

title: A fun way to get kids hands clean
text: Although I do like this slime, it's a very teeny tiny amount for thirty dollars. It does have beautiful colors, but that's about all I can really praise, it doesn't have very good stretch in my opinion. It is great to clean your hands, but there are so many ways to clean hands. This same brand makes some really great slimes that are so much more affordable, I'd recommend any of those over this.

title: HUGE game, I love it!!
text: Absolutely amazing game. Setup takes seconds. No crazy installation or anything. Looks really nice. Pretty well built and sturdy. Lots of fun, zero complaints here.

title: Stunning
text: This looks so much better in person than it did on screen, it really has depth and gorgeous color. I love the art so much. Instantly my favorite mat! Very well made, at least as good as any of the other brands and at a good price.

title: Clever packaging
text: It's very quick to learn and fun to play for kids. You can play with up to ten players or only two, which makes this very versatile for when you have a lot of kids over at once. Most games only go up to four players and leave a lot out of the fun. Very easy to store this as it's pretty small once put into it's clever packaging.

title: Cool action poses
text: I love the poses of these guys, makes it look like they were right in the middle of a battle against team rocket. Great sculpts with a fun action feature. Try not to lose Charizard's flame! These are perfect for any poke battle. Squirtle's eyes are a little too far apart on mine, but it's hard to notice from afar.

title: It never dries
text: I love so much that this stuff never dries out. That makes it so much better than any other brand, as you have to keep buying more of those. This one can last forever. Plus it comes with very cute figures and a storage case that fits everything. It sticks to itself very well, which makes it great for molding just about anything.

title: So cool!
text: I wish I had something like this as a little kid. Very cool space set up with a cool little astronaut and robot. Very good at teaching the very basics of making a circuit. The wheels go backwards for me though, which makes the headlights on the car be on the wrong side. Keep in mind, this set requires nine batteries in total, which is a lot!

title: A very cool space base
text: Lots of cool little astronauts, and a pretty big space base for them to roam around in. This would be a fun set for any very young kid that loves such things. The voice changer I think is one of the best parts, as well as how well it teaches very basic circuits. The wheels go backwards for me though, which makes the headlights on the car be on the wrong side. Keep in mind as well, this set requires fifteen batteries in total, which is a lot!

title: A great variety of colors and add ins
text: Perfect for a party or just giving to your kids as rewards for doing their chores. Love that all the add ins are in separate little bags and that all the slimes have nice airtight containers. These are just the right size for a kid and have a good slow stretch to them.

title: Really good premade slime
text: This was so much fun, and with the included airtight containers, it lasts for a really long time. A good selection of colors and a huge amount of slime too, each container is a couple handfuls for kids. What I love most though, is that when the slime is used up, you can reuse those containers for more of your own home made slime!

title: So much fun to make
text: What an interesting idea, I had never thought to add Elmer's glitter glues to normal glue before, but I'll sure keep it in mind for the future. Really easy to make slime that lasts for a long time if you keep it in an airtight container. Elmer's is the go to for slime.

title: Love Elmer's slime kits
text: Love fluffy slime so much and this kit comes with more activator than you really need, so I was able to use the extra on some of my own glue. Great colors, good instructions and a whole lot of fun.

title: Elmer's makes some of the best slime
text: Very fun kit, with great colors and effects. The glow is really good. This kit made a good amount of slime. It even comes with extra slime activator, so I was able to make a little bit more with some of my own glue. Very easy to follow instructions.

title: Dried out very quickly
text: There were a lot of fun colors, and if you don't mind it being one use, then this will be a great product for your kids. I however was hoping for it to last longer than what it did. I even kept it in airtight containers. Everything else was typical, from smell to the feel of it, etc.

title: Really cute doll house at a decent price
text: Got this for my niece's birthday and she absolutely LOVED it. It's important to me that we teach the kids about diversity and I'm thrilled to finally see Disney has become more diverse! Well made little toy set that you won't regret getting!

title: Not the best looking dinos or trees
text: This set is ok, but I think it would be best for very young children. Most of the dinos are the same ones repeated, but slightly smaller and are two pieces glues together in the middle, sometimes not so well. Those flat trees as well, so awful, and what's odd, is they have nicer looking trees, I'd have rather had one more of those than the flat trees. I know older children probably wouldn't like this set, but very young children won't care about such superficial complaints.

title: Time consuming, but very fun
text: I used to have something like this as a kid, but have never seen them for sale since. So happy someone has brought them back. They seem to be higher quality as well, as they are solid plastic and quite hefty for their small size.  Love the accessories, especially the one that helps you space everything perfectly. It's very fun to try to get creative with, and see what more you can do with them.

title: Not clear like in picture
text: I was really surprised when I first got mine, I thought something was wrong with it, as it's skin was more opaque than clear. So all the pictures show this thing to be clear, but they aren't, not unless you stretch it really thin. You can barely see the "bones" inside of it. I've seen lots of them on store shelves, so it's not just mine. The toy itself is indeed very stretchy and looks really cool. Love the soft feel of the body. I'll probably get more, but keeping in mind, they are only kind of clear.

title: A Halloween advent calendar, how fun!
text:
I love Mario and Halloween so this was great for me. It's not technically an advent calendar, but that's how I used it. I ended up with some great figures. The paint was fantastically done and the plastic feels like really high quality. Most of these are going right up on my display shelf. There is nothing about this kit that is Halloween though, so you can get it whenever really.

The dry bones (The skeleton turtle) doesn't stay upright, it stands on a little foot and although it does have a stand, it's as tiny as his foot, and so does literally nothing to help him stay upright. I'll have to make a better stand for him later. The glow in the dark boo had glue all over him, which I can't get off, so he'll have to go in the trash.

title: Easy for kids, but still fun enough for adults
text: This was really easy for my room mate to get and he usually hates games, and really entertaining for everyone. It was quick to learn all the rules and just start playing right away. The pieces are made out of a really heavy, sturdy plastic, I don't expect to ever have any problems with them breaking down the line.

title: Good colors and quantity
text:
These are a great deal. I quit making balloon animals years ago because of how much balloons cost, but these are a fraction of the price and still really great quality. I will end up using all of these and getting more again later. These are a good size for all your basic balloon animal needs.

Keep in mind, they don't have any of the colors or sizes needed to make the balloon sculptures you see in their pictures however..

title: I always love Mega Construx
text: I love this set, not that I am at all surprised by that. They have all been so, so good. Great instructions, great pieces and the figures are epic. Love how you get two sets of instructions as well, pretty much no one else does that. Although, you have to use a QR code to get the second set of instructions, and I do wish they just included that in physical form, just as a personal want. Can never recommend this brand enough.

title: It was everything it said it would be
text: A good wooden puzzle. No missing pieces, and the printing was decent. Not too much I can think of to say about this item. If you really like the image, I can recommend this item.

title: Amazing puzzle
text: Beautiful puzzle. Good quality pieces, all there. Was a lot of fun to assemble and the overall picture looked so nice we are going to attach it to a puzzle poster and hang it on the wall. This poster is just amazing!

title: Cute little set
text: This set is great for those of us who don't have the attention span to do one of those huge diamond paintings. The set is great quality and everything works as it should. Was a lot of fun to do this set!

title: An ok little truck
text:
This one's not the best, it's just ok. For the price point, I'd probably say look elsewhere. If this was priced a bit lower then it'd be worth it for maybe a little kid. For anyone who wants an RC truck that handles well and is responsive, this just isn't for you. It seems to be built semi-well if they could just figure out how to improve the steering and response time to the controls then it'd be perfect.

So again this would make a good small child's toy but not anything more.

title: Great set
text:
Great set! The wood case is cut in a way, that I can't fully open it and the inside of the cups are full of many splinters. The polished stones are a nice twist on an old game- much neater than boring old little glass stones.

Game is a lot of fun to play!

title: Beatiful set!
text: Definitely one of my favorite sets, I absolutely recommend it! Very nice quality dice!!! Get it!

title: Very fun toy set
text: This set was a lot of fun to set up and play with! This satisfies kids' need to destroy toys while playing with them but since it's meant to come apart, you can just put it back together which is amazing. Definitely love and recommend this!

title: Awesome dinosaur
text: Really cool dinosaur, well built. Is definitely a great addition to our dinosaur toy collection!

title: Cheaply made, 1st one we got was DOA
text: The first one we got didn't work at all, even with brand new batteries. The next one "works" but it's just so cheaply made that it barely does anything and isn't much fun. Don't really recommend this set at all.

title: Fun little sets
text: Simple and fun toy. Everything on the set works as it should. Definitely recommend this car set!

title: Good size great quality dice
text: The tin these come in is amazing, I absolutely love the bigger size of these, and the overall quality is great! No complaints at all.

title: Tons of fun! Great for adults too!
text: Got this for an adult who's a kid at heart and he absolutely loves this! Great for all ages! He loved all the little toys included in it. A very unique set that is completely different from any toys on the market!

title: The 25 levels of fun is a STRETCH
text:
The 25 levels of fun are hilarious because there really aren't 25 things to do with this- they were just really long-winded on writing the steps and stretched them out like a kid trying to stretch his report in school by writing in large print.

That being said it's a really fun set still! Just ignore the 25 steps and have some fun with it! I got this for an adult with Autism and he absolutely LOVED it. Lots of fun for little and big kids alike!

title: So Fabulous that Jeffree Star would approve!
text:
This is absolutely adorable and any boy or girl who loves pink absolutely needs it! It is just fabulous and adorable! But it's not all beauty, it also has functionality! It works amazingly well on grass or concrete which is nice! My niece and nephew love to drive it down the street to their friend's house. As with any power wheels, I recommend spare batteries if the kids are gonna be at them for a while. Get one or two extra and have em charged and ready to swap out.

Assembly was as easy as any of these are, took a little time but not too difficult. I grabbed a couple of drinks and a friend and we had it together in no time. The kids love it and we've had no problems with it. It's all plastic of course but other than that it's great! Speed is pretty good, Tons of fun!

title: Fun to put together, the kids love it!
text:
I got this for my nephew to play with when he visits. I had fun putting it together- assembly was pretty easy and straight forward. It took a little time but I just turned on the tv and put it together while watching tv.

He has had a blast playing with it and always wants to come to visit now! All the kids on the street want one after seeing him with his. He feels like a big kid now with his own car and it's so adorable. I honestly have no complaints other than battery time but for something this size, it's not surprising that the battery doesn't last forever. I think we've been getting around half an hour and sometimes a little more. So we got ahold of a couple of spare batteries and keep them charged and ready to swap out.

Quality for the price seems to be there for sure! I'm very happy with this purchase for what it is! I've spent more on electronics for myself that weren't nearly as fun or well built. Definitely recommend this one.

title: Love this little shark!!
text: It doesn't work so well in a tiny bathtub but in a larger area like a pool, it works flawlessly! I love this a lot!

title: Love the variety of scenes
text: Great mats, that will cover a plethera of scenarios. The mats do lay flat once you put the clips on the sides. The dry erase markers are really good quality and weren't dried out at all. They wipe off cleanly as well. The dice were basic, but good.

title: Very nice wood puzzle, looks great!
text: Great quality puzzle that looks good! All the pieces were there and fit together well. No complaints here!

title: Really nice car but none of the electronics worked
text: Really solid car that's really well made! The electronics didn't work even with new batteries and one of the doors is kind of off and won't close fully. Other than those little things it's a heavy-duty well-made car. The paint on it looks nice and everything. The electronics weren't a deal-breaker for us honestly, it's still a nice car without the lights and such.

title: Really good quality set
text: The quality of this is all really good. This was a lot of fun to setup and use- definitely recommend it! It's fake leather but still looks nice and is a lot of fun.

title: Fun kit! Glue and battery not included
text:
Kit was a ton of fun to put together and looks really nice! It should be noted that the kit doesn't include glue or a battery so you'll need to get those!

Everything in this kit is of pretty good quality and I'm really happy with this kit for the price point! Definitely have to get this and try it out for yourself!

title: Adorable well made binder
text: This is a very well made and adorable binder that I was very excited to have gotten! I have zero complaints on this one and love it completely! It arrived with no flaws or damage and seems to be of really good quality! Definitely recommend it!

title: Very nice mat
text:
This is a very nice mat and really my only complaint is the price seems kinda high. Other than that it's a really nice mat! The graphic on it is printed well and it seems to be made out of good materials.

We use this as a giant mouse pad/play area on our desk and it works flawlessly for that! Definitely love this mat.

title: Fun odd little game
text:
This odd little game was kind of fun to play. Very different from anything else I've ever played but it was nice to have this for the sake of variety in games. Easy enough to learn and I think any age group could learn to play this easily.

No complaints, just a cute card game.

title: Works ok, hard to understand how to set pin
text: No instructions, had to figure out how to set up the pin myself. Other than that this bank works decently and is functional.

title: Beautiful high quality puzzle
text: LOVE this wood puzzle! Very well made, durable, and has a beautiful design! Had a lot of fun with this puzzle and definitely recommend it due to it's high quality.

title: Deserves less than 1 star
text:
This drone is the worst we've ever tested. We've tested cheap ones and expensive ones and this one was the biggest disappointment and it absolutely is a safety concern! It randomly just stops responding to the remote and even with a full charge! Unlike what it claims- it doesn't just land when it loses signal- sometimes it'll continue to climb up into the air way over the house, sometimes it'll fly into things including almost hitting people at the park!

We got the first one and charged it fully and took it out back. Within a minute it went crazy and stopped responding and flew into the house, shattering 2 of the blades. We replaced those and tried again only to have it go unresponsive and run into our patch of sunflower stalks where it continued to run into my sunflowers cutting at them and after a few seconds of that it managed to burn up one of it's motors!

So we got a replacement and charged it and took it to the park. Within a couple minutes it went haywire and started flying at people when we weren't touching anything and it wouldn't let us land it or anything. Literally unresponsive!

We calibrated it multiple times and nothing helps. This thing is just a fancy looking dangerous paperweight. We've tested drones 1/3rd of the price that were way better made!

title: Really cute game
text: A really cute game that was a lot of fun to learn and a lot of fun to play for the family! Definitely recommend giving it a try, you'll love it!

title: Really fun game, nice to have found something outside the known old games!
text:
We were tired of the same old board games so we gave this one a try and love it! Easy to learn and a lot of fun to play for the whole family! Do recommend giving it a shot!

It did have several broken wooden pieces.

title: Really nice dice bag!
text: Really nice bag and it's soft on the inside to help keep the dice from getting scratched up. Very well made and quality product. Do recommend it!

title: Work great and not just for kids!
text: They're really self-explanatory to use and the clarity of sound is great! Definitely love these! We're adults and got these for camping and even for our house which sits on a few acres. It's very handy for when one of us goes across the property and we need to talk. We basically use these for little intercoms throughout the house and highly recommend them.

title: Awesome coins!
text: Very hefty feeling, love the clanking of these versus the cheap plastic ones. They just seem so much more real. The only complaint I have is these fake gold coins (no matter what brand)- all smell funny like chemicals. I don't trust the materials and paints used in them and just use these as display pieces. Just something to be wary of since none of these coins tell where they come from or the materials they're made of.

title: Well built gyroscope! Very nice.
text: Very nice looking, well built, and smooth operating! Definitely couldn't ask for more! I'm blown away at the price point of this gyroscope and the quality/ functional item you receive. Definitely recommend this one!

title: Handy sturdy trays
text: Neat little tray system that work well! Very nice quality, very happy about this set!

title: One of our favorite RC trucks we've tested!
text:
We've tested several RC trucks and this is probably our 3rd favorite which is still a pretty good rating considering how many we've tested! It's pretty well built, goes fast, and is just a lot of fun! I definitely love that it comes with 2 batteries. The headlights are a nice addition for when you wanna play with it at night time.

Functionality: It handles well/ pretty responsive. We really haven't had any issues at all out of this one! Pretty basic RC truck that works well!

title: Great puzzle but graphic isn't HD
text: I think the price point is slightly high considering the graphic on the puzzle isn't really that high quality. Other than that we loved the wood pieces and it was fun to put together. I do love the picture on it! Overall I think this is a great puzzle but should be priced at about half.

title: Classic games from where? I don't recognize a single game!
text: Don't recognize a single title, not American classics that's for sure! Aside from that, it works decently and the picture on it is pretty good. It'd be a great value if it actually had games I would play. As is I'm putting it in my pile of stuff to be donated because I don't know any of the games on it. Very sad about that.

title: Overpriced garbage
text: The price point is AWFUL on this and it's cheap thin garbage that falls apart. Would not stay together and the little tabs that hold it together snap off easily. Not happy with this at all! I definitely do not recommend this even if the price was a fraction of what it is! Company has horrible quality control and needs to test these products before releasing them.

title: A nice decoration or VERY basic toy
text: Very limited functions so honestly this is just a cute decoration we put on our shelf. He's fairly well built, just lacking functionality. If you wanted for a younger kid who is fine with very limited buttons on a remote then this is perfect for that! It's pretty well made and doesn't look like a cheap product like some of the branded toys out there. Overall I think this is ok, not CRAZY about it but it's ok.

title: A fun spin on your typical spirograph!
text: A fun spin on the spirograph we know and love! This is a lot of fun to play with and everything worked perfectly as it should! Makes some beautiful patterns on the included paper!

title: Works well, amazing game lineup for the price
text:
For the price you really can't lose with this one. SO it has a single (mono) speaker and the sound is so so. The video quality isn't too bad really. The small irritation I have is some games are in Chinese and there is no English option. So while playing Ninja Turtles, when it had text come across the screen I couldn't read any of it.

Other than the language thing this is amazing for the price! It works pretty well and the buttons functioned well enough. I love this because if I leave it somewhere or it breaks, I'm really not out much money.

title: The best puzzle I've got so far! SO beautiful!
text:
Definitely the prettiest puzzle hands down! The image on this with the castle and wolves is something like out of a fairy tale book and is mesmerizing to look at.

Puzzle is well made, easy enough to put together, and the image on it looks great! Overall we absolutely recommend and love this one.

title: Very nice set, some of the pieces don't fit exactly right
text: A couple of the pieces were kind of warped making this hard to put together and stay together. Eventually we got it snapped into place though and it's stayed together. That aside this set is amazing and we absolutely love it! The price point isn't horrible and it's a blast to play  with. Other than the warped pieces, this was pretty easy to put together.

title: Fun set
text: Really fun to put together and even funner to play with. We're in our 30s and still find it a blast to play with these sets! Was easy to put together but our one complaint would be there's no way on earth you'll ever manage to fit this back into it's box. We fought with it for an insane amount of time and dumped it all out and tried again and no matter what we couldn't get it back in without leaving parts out.  That frustration aside it's a great set and a lot of fun! The price point isn't too bad either for what it is.

title: Amazing set!
text: We're loving this Halo series they have going on, each set has been fantastic and a must have for any Halo junkie. We had a blast putting this set together and everything is great quality and as it should be. It's a great value at the price point it's at. Very fun and easy to put together and a blast to play with, especially when you put it together with the other sets. Great fun for kids and adults that grew up with Halo.

title: Neat idea, cheap hair
text: We got one with hair that looks like a child played with it for a few years and then they put it in a box and gave it to us. The hair looks crazy and cheap sadly. Minus that the crystal thing is cool, we'll definitely be keeping that. The price point isn't awful so I'd say if they removed the hair and stuck with painted on hair, this would be perfect.

title: The magic 8 ball you know and love in a vintage box
text:
So this is the same as the other magic 8 balls, no different design at all but there is a really cool vintage box for you collectors out there. I have mine on display next to the box. Everything looks fantastic except for the little sight glass you look into, it is all scuffed up from the way they store it in the box. In the box there's a plastic holder it sits in and it gets shuffled all around and scratches up the suface of the sight glass (which is plastic) so it leaves ugly scratches. They aren't DEEP so I think you could easily buff them out but it is annoying.

Minus that minor annoyance of packaging- this box is amazing looking and I definitely love it! Works as it should and looks great!

title: Funnest advent calendar around!
text:
Got one of these for me and slid it out the side to check all the toys out and review them. This sets amazing for the price! I think it's a great value and for anyone who loves Hot Wheels, this advent calendar is a must! I'll definitely be buying one next year and already look forward to it!

As always all of the cars and parts are great quality and look fantastic! Can't go wrong with this brand in my experience.

title: Yasss!!! This game is amazing!
text:
I love EVERYTHING about this version of Clue! I'll admit I'm kind of a collector of various versions of Clue and this one is definitely one of my favorites! Very nice looking box, game pieces look great, and the game board itself looks fantastic!

They did a great job putting this one together for all of us Sabrina fans! So while you wait for the next season to drop, grab this game and dive into it with friends- you won't regret it! Great quality set that is a lot of fun!

title: Fun for all ages!
text: We're big little kids and ordered this just to try out and had a blast with it! the foam is really good quality and doesn't dry out like some of the cheap ones. The game itself is easy and a lot of fun in general! I do recommend if you want to play something outside of the normal games we grew up with! Everything here is of decent quality and we have no real complaints.

title: Great puzzle, the poster has annoying ads printed on it.
text: So if you're getting this for the poster, just know it has ads on it. It personally ruins the poster for me. But that being said the poster itself is nice quality and I'm very happy with it. All the pieces are there, all the printing on them was perfect! Just a great puzzle!

title: Fun little toy, accesories don't fit any of the figures.
text: We have a few of these and most of the little accessories that go on them or they stand on- they don't fit any of the figures we have. Other than that these are pretty neat! I feel like the price point should be lower but they're fun other than that.

title: Issues with the base plate warping and hard to put together
text:
The main base plate pieces aren't sized right, it warps the plate as you put the thing together. The pieces try and pop off as you're putting it together as a result. But if you manage to get it together, it's a nice little set! The price isn't the worst honestly. especially if you compare it to other big building block companies.

Overall this is a fun little set that I think most kids (and adult kids) would enjoy. They need to work on the base plate issue but it's perfect aside from that. I gave it a neutral rating in my book because of this.

title: Fun little dump truck!
text:
This was a blast to play with in our sandbox and we all loved it! The kids love it and we love it because we grew up with toys like this on our parents farm so it brings back memories!

Definitely recommend these and they're a great value! A little more plastic than I care for but they still seem like decent quality.

title: Meh. Gum was disgusting!
text:
Not happy about this one at all! I gave it 2 stars because it was fun to see how you make gum but once we were done it all had to go in the trash because no one that tried it enjoyed it. The flavor kind of hits your mouth for a brief second and then nothing... It's just bitter tasting after. I think if they could work out a longer lasting flavor it'd be that much better and maybe a formula that didn't use so much corn syrup too.

So if you read all that and still want to try it yourself, the only other thing you'll need is wax paper for the wrappers. It comes with little stickers but you have to cut out your own wrappers if you want em. I'd also recommend using plastic disposable utensils as the gum is HARD to get off of metal utensils.

That's my 2 cents on this kit. We weren't impressed but if you want to see how gum is made then go for it!

title: Really cool kit!!
text:
So this kit was a blast to do! The one complaint I have but this is on me- we are at a loss as to what to do with it once we put the slime in the mold and it set. It's not true slime and once it's set in place it's more like gel, it can only really be squeezed but not molded into anything else once it's set.

So if you're fine with the thing being a one time use then I'd say go for it! The kit was still fun and the parts all came out really nicely as you can see in the photos! I give this 4 stars because I wasn't AMAZED by it but it's still a pretty fun set!

title: Kit is a lot of fun!
text:
This kit was a blast! The picture of the crystals is after it sat for a while... At first it's actually like little crystals and then as time goes on it puffs out and doesn't look like crystals as much.

SO this kit is fun and easy to use and the only real complaints I would list are the part that spins the test tube really doesn't spin. It's pretty awful and you're better off shaking the tube yourself. The whole thing wobbles when you go to spin it too. So I took off one star for that.

Other than that one thing the kit is a lot of fun and I think your kids will definitely enjoy this! It's a great way to teach your kids about science!

title: Adorable fun game!
text:
This was a very adorable and fun game to play for all ages in my family! It was easy to play and it is definitely something we've never played before so we appreciate it giving us a whole new game to play!!

We will be adding this fun little game to our game closet and pulling it out on game nights often I can tell you! Lots of fun!

title: Neat kit!!
text:
Got this for my roommate who has Autism and he loves it! He said he loves that the little cutting tools snap into place in the lids of the cups so you don't lose them. He also said the cups are very sturdy and everything is very well built! The sand is very fine and molds well. It comes white and you add the color yourself and can choose to add the glitter or not. We chose NOT to add the glitter as we don't want it on everything.

Overall we definitely say this is a good set and a good value!

title: Finally a decent sized book!
text: Most of the coloring books these days are thin as can be, this one has a lot of pages to it!!! Really enjoying this book!!

title: and did not easy off. Very disappointed with it
text: The color we were supposed to apply to her didn't work very well, and did not easy off.  Very disappointed with it.

title: Highly recommended!  Well worth the price.
text: I loved it!  Very well made, good workmanship.  My granddaughter was very happy with it.

title: Didn't Work.....
text: Doesn't work

title: Great game
text: Such a fun co-op game

title: These Pages Work Perfectly Fine For Baseball Cards!
text:
These 9 pocket pages work perfectly fine for baseball cards. They are 6 mm thick, which is the same thickness as Card Guard or Ultra Pro SILVER Series pages (not Ultra Pro Platinum). The seems welds are strong and do not tear apart like some other reviews have said. The individual pockets are slightly oversized, which is actually kind of nice because your sports cards slide right into the pockets.

However, these are not comparable to Ultra Pro Platinum. Of course they aren't. If you buy a box of 400 of these, that works out to be $0.09 per page. Ultra Pro Platinum pages are between $0.20 and $0.22. so these pages are half the price. You should not expect them to be the same durability as UP Platinum.

But overall, these pages provide great protection for cards and at $0.09 per page are a great value. If you store sports cards in binders and 9 pocket pages, these are the highest quality at the lowest price you will find. I would recommend you at least give them a try. But if superior durability and protection is what you are after, then you probably want to pay the higher price and go with UP Platinum.

title: Great Piglet Ears
text: These are wonderful! My daughter was Piglet for Halloween. She is 11 and the ears were a comfortable fit.
